08964 $   PROCESSENTRY32 info = { sizeof (info) };
08965 $   for (bool ok = !!Process32First (sshot, &info); ok; ok = !!Process32Next (sshot, &info))
08966         {
08967         bool kill = false;
08968 
08969         if (!kill && pid  && info.th32ParentProcessID        == pid) {$ kill = true; }
08970 
08971         if (!kill && name && _stricmp (info.szExeFile, name) == 0)   {$ kill = true; }
08972 
08973         if (!kill)
08974             {
08975             wchar_t cmdLineW[_TX_BUFSIZE] = L"";
08976             if (!_txGetCommandLine (cmdLineW, sizearr (cmdLineW), info.th32ProcessID)) { continue; }
08977 
08978             if (*cmdLineW && stristrw (cmdLineW, cmdLineSubstrW))    {$ kill = true; }
08979             }
08980 
08981         if (kill)
08982             {
08983 $           if (_txKillProcess (info.th32ProcessID))
08984                 {$ killed++; }
08985             }
08986         }
08987 
08988 $   CloseHandle (sshot);
08989 
08990 $   return killed;
08991 
08992     #undef name
08993     #undef cmdLine
08994     #undef pid
08995     }
08996 
08997 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
08998 
08999 bool _txKillProcess (DWORD pid)
09000     {
09001 $3  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (pid)) return false;
09002 
09003 $   HANDLE token = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
09004 $   OpenProcessToken (GetCurrentProcess(), TOKEN_ADJUST_PRIVILEGES | TOKEN_QUERY, &token) asserted;
09005 
09006 $   LUID luid = {};
09007 $   LookupPrivilegeValue (NULL, SE_DEBUG_NAME, &luid) asserted;
09008 
09009 $   TOKEN_PRIVILEGES priv = { 1, {{{ luid.LowPart, luid.HighPart}, SE_PRIVILEGE_ENABLED }}};
09010 $   TOKEN_PRIVILEGES old  = {};
09011 
09012 $   DWORD oldSz = 0;
09013 $   AdjustTokenPrivileges (token, false, &priv, sizeof (priv), &old, &oldSz) asserted;
09014 
09015 $   HANDLE proc = OpenProcess (PROCESS_ALL_ACCESS, 0, pid);
09016 $   if (!proc) return false;
09017 
09018 $   bool ok = !!Win32::TerminateProcess (proc, 0);
09019 $   CloseHandle (proc);
09020 
09021 $   return ok;
09022     }
09023 
09024 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09025 
09026 PROCESSENTRY32* _txFindProcess (unsigned pid /*= GetCurrentProcessId()*/)
09027     {
09028 $4  static PROCESSENTRY32 info = { sizeof (info) };
09029 $   if (!pid) return &info;
09030 
09031 $   HANDLE sshot = CreateToolhelp32Snapshot (TH32CS_SNAPPROCESS, 0);
09032 $   assert (sshot); if (!sshot) return NULL;
09033 
09034 $   for (bool ok = !!Process32First (sshot, &info); ok; ok = !!Process32Next (sshot, &info))
09035         if (info.th32ProcessID == pid) break;
09036 
09037 $   CloseHandle (sshot);
09038 
09039 $   return &info;
09040     }
09041 
09042 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09043 
09044 bool _txGetCommandLine (wchar_t cmdLine[], size_t szCmdLine, unsigned pid /*= _getpid()*/)
09045     {
09046 $4  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (cmdLine))        return false;
09047 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (szCmdLine >= 2)) return false;
09048 
09049 $   if (pid == (unsigned) _getpid())
09050         {
09051 $       wcsncpy_s (cmdLine, szCmdLine, GetCommandLineW(), szCmdLine-1);
09052 $       return true;
09053         }
09054 
09055 $   HANDLE proc = OpenProcess (PROCESS_QUERY_INFORMATION | PROCESS_VM_READ, false, pid);
09056     if (!proc) {$ return false; }
09057 
09058 $   Win32::PROCESS_BASIC_INFORMATION pbi = {};
09059 $   Win32::NtQueryInformationProcess (proc, 0 /*ProcessBasicInformation*/, &pbi, sizeof (pbi), NULL) == 0 asserted;
09060 
09061     // Should use ReadProcessMemory() because the info is actually in another address space
09062 
09063 $   bool ok = true;
09064 
09065 $   Win32::PEB peb = {};
09066     if (ok && pbi.PebBaseAddress)        {$ ok &= !!ReadProcessMemory (proc, pbi.PebBaseAddress,        &peb,    sizeof (peb),    NULL); }
09067 
09068 $   Win32::RTL_USER_PROCESS_PARAMETERS params = {};
09069     if (ok && peb.ProcessParameters)     {$ ok &= !!ReadProcessMemory (proc, peb.ProcessParameters,     &params, sizeof (params), NULL); }
09070 
09071 $   *cmdLine = 0;
09072     if (ok && params.CommandLine.Buffer) {$ ok &= !!ReadProcessMemory (proc, params.CommandLine.Buffer, cmdLine,
09073                                                                        MIN  (params.CommandLine.Length + 2, (int) (szCmdLine * sizeof (*cmdLine)) - 2),
09074                                                                        NULL); }
09075 $   CloseHandle (proc) asserted;
09076 
09077 $   return ok;
09078     }
09079 
09080 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09081 
09082 #define RVA_(type, module, addr)  ( (type) ((uintptr_t) (module) + (uintptr_t) (addr)) )
09083 
09084 IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* _txGetNtHeaders (HMODULE module /*= GetModuleHandle (NULL)*/)
09085     {
09086 $4  assert (module);
09087 
09088 $   IMAGE_DOS_HEADER* dosHdr = RVA_ (IMAGE_DOS_HEADER*, module, 0);
09089 $   IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* ntHdr  = RVA_ (IMAGE_NT_HEADERS*, module, dosHdr->e_lfanew);
09090 
09091 $   return (dosHdr->e_magic  == IMAGE_DOS_SIGNATURE &&
09092             ntHdr->Signature == IMAGE_NT_SIGNATURE)? ntHdr : NULL;
09093     }
09094 
09095 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09096 
09097 // TXLib continues to hack the reality to make your life better, sweeter and easier
09098 
09099 uintptr_t _txSetProcAddress (const char funcName[], uintptr_t newFunc, const char dllName[] /*= NULL*/, int useHotPatching /*= false*/,
09100                              HMODULE module /*= NULL*/, bool debug /*= false*/)
09101     {
09102 $4  if (debug) txOutputDebugPrintf ("_txSetProcAddress (%s, 0x%p, %s, 0x%p):\n", funcName, (void*) newFunc, dllName, module);
09103 
09104 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (funcName)) return 0;
09105 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (newFunc))  return 0;
09106 
09107 $   if (!module) module = GetModuleHandle (NULL);
09108 $   if (!module) return 0;
09109 
09110 $   HMODULE dll     = (dllName)? GetModuleHandle (dllName)       : NULL;
09111 $   PROC    oldFunc = (dll)?     GetProcAddress  (dll, funcName) : NULL;
09112 
09113 $   if (useHotPatching && oldFunc)
09114         {
09115 $       const size_t jmpSz = 1 + sizeof (DWORD);  // sizeof (JMP rel instruction)
09116 
09117 $       DWORD oldRights = 0;
09118 $       if (!VirtualProtect ((void*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc, jmpSz, PAGE_EXECUTE_READWRITE, &oldRights)) return 0;
09119 
09120         // Overwrite oldFunc prolog with JMP trampoline to newFunc.
09121         // Calling oldFunc from any location will lead to newFunc call anyway.
09122 
09123 $       *(BYTE*)  ((char*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc + 0) = 0xE9;  // JMP rel
09124 $       *(DWORD*) ((char*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc + 1) = ((char*)(uintptr_t) newFunc - (char*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc - jmpSz) & 0xFFFFFFFF;
09125 
09126 $       FlushInstructionCache (GetCurrentProcess(), (void*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc, jmpSz);
09127 
09128 $       VirtualProtect ((void*)(uintptr_t) oldFunc, jmpSz, oldRights, &oldRights);
09129 
09130 $       return (uintptr_t) oldFunc;
09131         }
09132 
09133 //  For PE structure and Import Table format, e.g. see https://books.google.ru/books?id=ifQPC86G66sC&pg=PA255
09134 //  and below through Figure 5-5, and/or http://www.brokenthorn.com/Resources/OSDevPE.html.
09135 
09136 $   IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* ntHdr = _txGetNtHeaders (module);
09137     if (!ntHdr || (ntHdr ->OptionalHeader.Magic != IMAGE_NT_OPTIONAL_HDR_MAGIC)) {$ return 0; }
09138 
09139 $   DWORD impOffset = ntHdr->OptionalHeader.DataDirectory[IMAGE_DIRECTORY_ENTRY_IMPORT].VirtualAddress;
09140 $   IMAGE_IMPORT_DESCRIPTOR* desc = RVA_ (IMAGE_IMPORT_DESCRIPTOR*, module, impOffset);
09141 
09142 $   if (desc == (IMAGE_IMPORT_DESCRIPTOR*) ntHdr) return 0;
09143 
09144 $   IMAGE_THUNK_DATA* thunk0 = NULL, * thunk1 = NULL;
09145 $   char*  impDll  = NULL;
09146 $   char*  impName = NULL;
09147 $   void** impPtr  = NULL;
09148 $   bool   found   = false;
09149 
09150     for (; desc->Name; desc++)
09151         {
09152 $       impDll = RVA_ (char*, module, desc->Name);
09153 $       if (dllName && _stricmp (impDll, dllName) != 0) continue;
09154 
09155 $       for (thunk0 = RVA_ (IMAGE_THUNK_DATA*, module, desc->OriginalFirstThunk),
09156              thunk1 = RVA_ (IMAGE_THUNK_DATA*, module, desc->FirstThunk);
09157 
09158              thunk0 && thunk1 && thunk1->u1.Function;
09159 
09160              thunk0++,
09161              thunk1++)
09162             {
09163             impName = (char*) RVA_ (IMAGE_IMPORT_BY_NAME*, module, thunk0->u1.AddressOfData) -> Name;
09164             impPtr  = (void**)(uintptr_t)                         &thunk1->u1.Function;  // Should change it, so this is ptr
09165 
09166             if (debug) txOutputDebugPrintf ("[0x%p] %s!%s\n", *impPtr, impDll, impName);
09167 
09168             if ((oldFunc && (uintptr_t) oldFunc == (uintptr_t) *impPtr) ||
09169                 (impName && _stricmp (funcName, impName) == 0))
09170                 {
09171                 found = true;
09172                 break;
09173                 }
09174             }
09175 
09176 $       if (found) break;
09177         }
09178 
09179     if (debug) txOutputDebugPrintf ("_txSetProcAddress (%s, 0x%p, %s, 0x%p): %s\n\n",
09180                                     funcName, (void*) newFunc, dllName, module, (found? "FOUND" : "NOT found"));
09181 $   if (!found) return 0;
09182 
09183 $   DWORD rights = PAGE_READWRITE;
09184 $   if (!VirtualProtect (impPtr, sizeof (*impPtr), rights, &rights)) return 0;
09185 
09186 $   *(uintptr_t*) impPtr = newFunc;
09187 
09188 $   VirtualProtect (impPtr, sizeof (*impPtr), rights, &rights);
09189 
09190 $   return (uintptr_t) oldFunc;
09191     }
09192 
09193 #undef RVA_
09194 
09195 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09196 
09197 bool _txInDll()
09198     {
09199 $4  MODULEENTRY32 mod = { sizeof (mod) };
09200 
09201 $   HANDLE sshot = CreateToolhelp32Snapshot (TH32CS_SNAPMODULE, 0);
09202 $   assert (sshot); if (!sshot) return false;
09203 
09204 $   bool inDll = false;
09205 
09206 $   for (bool ok = !!Module32First (sshot, &mod); ok; ok = !!Module32Next (sshot, &mod))
09207         {
09208 $       if (!mod.modBaseAddr) continue;
09209 
09210 $       IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* ntHdr = _txGetNtHeaders ((HMODULE) mod.modBaseAddr);
09211 
09212 $       inDll = ntHdr && ((ntHdr->FileHeader.Characteristics & IMAGE_FILE_DLL) != 0);
09213 
09214 $       if (In (std::nomeow, (BYTE*)(uintptr_t)_txInDll, mod.modBaseAddr, mod.modBaseAddr + mod.modBaseSize))
09215             {$ break; }
09216         }
09217 
09218 $   CloseHandle (sshot);
09219 $   return inDll;
09220     }
09221 
09222 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09223 
09224 bool _txIsConsoleSubsystem()
09225     {
09226 $4  IMAGE_NT_HEADERS* ntHdr = _txGetNtHeaders();
09227 
09228 $   return  ntHdr &&
09229             ntHdr ->OptionalHeader.Magic == IMAGE_NT_OPTIONAL_HDR_MAGIC &&
09230 
09231            (ntHdr ->OptionalHeader.Subsystem == IMAGE_SUBSYSTEM_WINDOWS_CUI ||
09232             ntHdr ->OptionalHeader.Subsystem == IMAGE_SUBSYSTEM_POSIX_CUI);
09233     }
09234 
09235 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09236 
09237 bool _txIsBadReadPtr (const void* address)
09238     {
09239     MEMORY_BASIC_INFORMATION mbi = {};
09240     if (!VirtualQuery (address, &mbi, sizeof (mbi))) return true;
09241 
09242     if (mbi.Protect & (PAGE_GUARD | PAGE_NOACCESS))  return true;  // Guard page -> bad ptr
09243 
09244     DWORD readRights = PAGE_READONLY | PAGE_READWRITE | PAGE_WRITECOPY | PAGE_EXECUTE_READ | PAGE_EXECUTE_READWRITE | PAGE_EXECUTE_WRITECOPY;
09245 
09246     return !(mbi.Protect & readRights);
09247     }
09248 
09249 #endif // TX_COMPILED
09250 
09251 //}
09252 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09253 
09255 //}
09256 //=================================================================================================================
09257 
09258 //=================================================================================================================
09259 //{          Internal TXLib window functions     (_txCanvas...)
09261 //=================================================================================================================
09262 
09263 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
09264 
09265 unsigned WINAPI _txCanvas_ThreadProc (void* data)
09266     {
09267     #define SetClassLong_  SetClassLongPtr
09268     #define GCL_HICON_     GCLP_HICON
09269     #define GCL_HICONSM_   GCLP_HICONSM
09270     #define GCL_HCURSOR_   GCLP_HCURSOR
09271 
09272 $8  _txCanvas_ThreadId = GetCurrentThreadId();
09273 
09274 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (data)) return false;
09275 
09276 $   unsigned long stackSize = _TX_STACKSIZE;
09277 $   _TX_CALL (Win32::SetThreadStackGuarantee, (&stackSize));
09278 
09279 $   HWND wnd = _txCanvas_CreateWindow ((SIZE*) data);
09280 $   if (!txWindow()) return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("\a" "Cannot create canvas!"), 0;
09281 
09282 $   HICON   icon32 = LoadIcon         (NULL, "_TX_ICON");
09283 $   HICON   icon16 = LoadIcon         (NULL, "_TX_ICONSM");
09284 $   HCURSOR cursor = LoadCursor       (NULL, "_TX_CURSOR");
09285 $   HMENU   menu   = LoadMenu         (NULL, "_TX_MENU");
09286 $   HACCEL  accel  = LoadAccelerators (NULL, "_TX_ACCELERATORS");
09287 
09288 $   SetClassLong_ (wnd, GCL_HICON_,   (LONG_PTR) (icon32? icon32 : _txCreateTXIcon (32)));
09289 $   SetClassLong_ (wnd, GCL_HICONSM_, (LONG_PTR) (icon16? icon16 : _txCreateTXIcon (16)));
09290 $   SetClassLong_ (wnd, GCL_HCURSOR_, (LONG_PTR) (cursor? cursor : LoadCursor (NULL, IDC_ARROW)));
09291 
09292     if (menu) {$ SetMenu (wnd, menu); DrawMenuBar (wnd); }
09293 
09294 $   Win32::GdiSetBatchLimit (1);
09295 
09296     _TX_ON_DEBUG (OutputDebugString (_TX_VERSION " - STARTED: " _TX_MODULE "\n"));
09297 
09298 $   SetForegroundWindow (wnd);
09299 
09300 $   ShowWindow          (wnd, SW_SHOW);
09301 $   UpdateWindow        (wnd);
09302 
09303 $   _txRunning = true;
09304 
09305 $   MSG msg = {};
09306 $   while (GetMessage (&msg, NULL, 0, 0))
09307         {
09308         if (!msg.hwnd) {$ continue; }
09309 
09310         if (accel && TranslateAccelerator (wnd, accel, &msg)) {$ continue; }
09311 
09312 $       TranslateMessage (&msg);
09313 $       DispatchMessage  (&msg);
09314 
09315 $       Sleep (0);
09316         }
09317 
09318 $   if (icon16) DestroyIcon (icon16);  // If Explorer is displaying Tray Notification, these
09319 $   if (icon32) DestroyIcon (icon32);  // calls will possibly fail, and we'll get resource leak.
09320 
09321 $   LeaveCriticalSection (&_txCanvas_LockBackBuf);
09322 
09323     _TX_ON_DEBUG (OutputDebugString (_TX_VERSION " - STOPPED: " _TX_MODULE "\n"));
09324 
09325 $   if (_txWatchdogTimeout >= 0)
09326         {$ Win32::_beginthread (_txWatchdogTerminator, 0, &_txWatchdogTimeout); }
09327 
09328 $   if (_txRunning && _txMain)         // Main window is destroyed but main() is still running.
09329         {                              // No chances for good termination, so use exit().
09330 $       _txCleanup();
09331 $       ::exit ((int) msg.wParam);
09332         }
09333 
09334 $   _txCanvas_ThreadId = 0;
09335 $   return true;
09336 
09337     #undef SetClassLong
09338     #undef GCL_HICON_
09339     #undef GCL_HICONSM_
09340     #undef GCL_HCURSOR_
09341     }
09342 
09343 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09344 
09345 HWND _txCanvas_CreateWindow (const SIZE* sizePtr)
09346     {
09347 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (sizePtr)) return NULL;
09348 
09349 $   bool centered = false;
09350     if (sizePtr->cx < 0 && sizePtr->cy < 0) {$ centered = true; }
09351 
09352 $   SIZE screen = { GetSystemMetrics (SM_CXSCREEN), GetSystemMetrics (SM_CYSCREEN) };
09353 $   RECT rect   = { 0, 0, abs (sizePtr->cx), abs (sizePtr->cy) }; AdjustWindowRect (&rect, _txWindowStyle, false);
09354 $   SIZE size   = { rect.right - rect.left, rect.bottom - rect.top };
09355 
09356 $   const char* wndClass = txRegisterClass ("MAIN", _txCanvas_WndProc, CS_HREDRAW | CS_VREDRAW | CS_OWNDC, BLACK_BRUSH, 0);
09357 $   if (!wndClass) return (HWND) NULL;
09358 
09359 $   HWND wnd = CreateWindowEx (WS_EX_APPWINDOW, wndClass, txGetModuleFileName (false), _txWindowStyle | WS_CLIPCHILDREN,
09360                                centered? screen.cx/2 - size.cx/2 : CW_USEDEFAULT,
09361                                centered? screen.cy/2 - size.cy/2 : CW_USEDEFAULT,
09362                                size.cx, size.cy, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
09363 $   if (!wnd || !txWindow())
09364         {$ return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Cannot create canvas: CreateWindowEx() failed"), (HWND) NULL; }
09365 
09366 $   HMENU menu = GetSystemMenu (txWindow(), false);
09367     if (!menu) {$ return txWindow(); }
09368 
09369 $   AppendMenu (menu, MF_SEPARATOR, 0, NULL)                       asserted;
09370 $   AppendMenu (menu, MF_STRING, _TX_IDM_CONSOLE, "Show &Console") asserted;
09371 $   AppendMenu (menu, MF_STRING, _TX_IDM_ABOUT,   "&About...")     asserted;
09372 
09373 $   return txWindow();
09374     }
09375 
09376 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09377 
09378 const char* txRegisterClass (const char classId[], WNDPROC wndProc, unsigned style, int backBrush, int wndExtra)
09379     {
09380 $8  assert (classId);
09381 $   assert (wndProc);
09382 
09383 $   static char name[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
09384 $   _tx_snprintf_s (name, sizeof (name) - 1, "/*---[TXLib]-[%s]------------ "
09385                                              _TX_VERSION "  " __FILE__ "  WndClass %08lX "
09386                                              "-------------[%s]-[TXLib]---*/",
09387                                              classId, (unsigned long) GetTickCount(), classId);
09388 $   WNDCLASS wc      = { sizeof (wc) };
09389 
09390 $   wc.lpszClassName = name;
09391 $   wc.lpfnWndProc   = wndProc;
09392 $   wc.style         = style;
09393 $   wc.cbWndExtra    = (wndExtra + 1) * (int) sizeof (long);
09394 
09395 $   wc.hCursor       = LoadCursor (NULL, IDC_ARROW);
09396 $   wc.hbrBackground = (HBRUSH) Win32::GetStockObject (backBrush);
09397 
09398 $   ATOM atom = RegisterClass (&wc);
09399     if (!atom) {$ TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("RegisterClass (\"%s\") failed", name); return 0; }
09400 
09401 $   return (const char*)(uintptr_t) atom;
09402     }
09403 
09404 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09405 
09406 int _txCanvas_SetRefreshLock (int count)
09407     {
09408 $8  int oldCount = _txCanvas_RefreshLock;
09409 
09410 $   _txCanvas_RefreshLock = count;
09411 
09412 $   HWND wnd = txWindow();
09413 
09414 $   if ((_txCanvas_RefreshLock <= 0 || oldCount <= 0) && wnd)
09415         {$ RedrawWindow (wnd, NULL, NULL, RDW_INVALIDATE | RDW_INTERNALPAINT | RDW_UPDATENOW); }
09416 
09417 $   return oldCount;
09418     }
09419 
09420 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09421 
09422 HICON _txCreateTXIcon (int size)
09423     {
09424 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (size == 32 || size == 16)) return NULL;
09425 
09426 $   const unsigned char image32 [32*32+1] =
09427         "00000000000000000000000000000000""0FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF0""0F0000000000000000000000000000F0""0F0000000000000000000000000000F0"
09428         "0F0000000000000099999999999900F0""0F0000000000000090300333330900F0""0F0000000990000090000000000900F0""0F00000099990000900BB000000900F0"
09429         "0F0000039999000090B00090900900F0""0F0000009999000090B00999990900F0""0F00000009903799900BB090900900F0""0F000000009BB70090000010000900F0"
09430         "0F0000000B90000090000000000900F0""0F000000B0B0000099999999999900F0""0F00007B30B0000090000000000000F0""0F00007300B0000090000000000000F0"
09431         "0F00000000B3000090000000000000F0""0F0000000B0B000090000000000000F0""0F000000B303B00090000000000000F0""0F000003B000B00090000000000000F0"
09432         "0F00003B00003B0090000000000000F0""0F0000300000030090000000000000F0""0F0000000448888888888844000000F0""0F00004886E6E6E60E66E6EEEE4400F0"
09433         "0F4488866E0E60E00660E06E66EEE4F0""0F868806E06E06E666E66E00E06EE6F0""0F08606E66E0066000E006E66E00E6F0""0F8666E006600E00006600E006E00EF0"
09434         "0F000E066888888888888888606660F0""0F66EEE6EE000E00000E00086EEEE6F0""0FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF0""00000000000000000000000000000000";
09435 
09436 $   const unsigned char image16 [16*16+1] =
09437         "0000000000000000""0000000999999990""0009000900000090""0099900909973090""0059700909009390""0009799909973090""0099000900000090""0959330999999990"
09438         "0709500900000000""0095930900000000""0090393900000000""0790073900000000""0900000900000000""000EE6E6E6E6E000""0EE6E6E6E6E6EEE0""0000000000000000";
09439 
09440 $   const COLORREF pal['F'-'0'+1] = { 0x000000, 0x002b2b, 0x555500, 0x005555, 0x808000, 0x008080, 0xaaaa00, 0x00aaaa, 0xd5d500, 0x00d5d5, 0,0,0,0,0,0,0,
09441                                       0xffff00, 0x00ffff, 0xffffaa, 0xaaffff, 0xd5d500, 0xffffff };
09442 
09443 $   const unsigned char* image = (size == 32)? image32 : image16;
09444 
09445 $   POINT sz = { size, size };
09446 $   HDC dcMask  = _txBuffer_Create (txWindow(), &sz); assert (dcMask);
09447 $   HDC dcColor = _txBuffer_Create (txWindow(), &sz); assert (dcColor);
09448 
09449 $   for (int i = 0; i < size*size; i++)
09450         {
09451         assert (In (std::nomeow, image[i], '0', '9') ||
09452                 In (std::nomeow, image[i], 'A', 'F'));
09453 
09454         Win32::SetPixel (dcColor, i % size, i / size, pal [image[i] - '0']);
09455         }
09456 
09457 $   ICONINFO info = { true, 0, 0, (HBITMAP) Win32::GetCurrentObject (dcMask,  OBJ_BITMAP),
09458                                   (HBITMAP) Win32::GetCurrentObject (dcColor, OBJ_BITMAP) };
09459 
09460 $   HICON icon = CreateIconIndirect (&info);
09461 $   assert (icon);
09462 
09463 $   _txBuffer_Delete (&dcMask)  asserted;
09464 $   _txBuffer_Delete (&dcColor) asserted;
09465 
09466 $   return icon;
09467     }
09468 
09469 #endif // TX_COMPILED
09470 
09471 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09472 
09473 inline bool _txCanvas_OK()
09474     {
09475     return _txCanvas_ThreadId   &&
09476            _txCanvas_Window     &&
09477            _txCanvas_BackBuf[0] &&
09478            _txCanvas_BackBuf[1] &&
09479            _txCanvas_Pixels;
09480     }
09481 
09482 //}
09483 //=================================================================================================================
09484 
09485 //=================================================================================================================
09486 //{          Main window event handlers          (_txCanvas_On...)
09488 //=================================================================================================================
09490 
09491 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
09492 
09493 LRESULT CALLBACK _txCanvas_WndProc (HWND wnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wpar, LPARAM lpar)
09494     {
09495 #if defined (_TX_ALLOW_TRACE)
09496 
09497     int inTX = _txLoc::Cur.inTX++;
09498 
09499     if (_txLoc::Cur.trace) _txTrace (__FILE__, __LINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__, "%*s" "0x%X <- 0x%03X (0x%08X, 0x%08lX)",
09500                                      2 * (_txLoc::Cur.inTX - 1), "", wnd, msg, wpar, lpar);
09501     _txLoc::Cur.inTX = inTX;
09502 
09503 #endif
09504 
09505 $8  if (msg == WM_KEYDOWN && wpar == VK_F12 &&
09506         GetKeyState (VK_SHIFT) && GetKeyState (VK_CONTROL) && GetKeyState (VK_MENU))
09507         {
09508 $       _txCanvas_OnCmdABOUT (wnd,      wpar);
09509 $       return DefWindowProc (wnd, msg, wpar, lpar);
09510         }
09511 
09512     WNDPROC altWndProc = _txAltWndProc;  // Cache to prevent change from main thread
09513     if (altWndProc)
09514         {
09515 $       LRESULT res = altWndProc (wnd, msg, wpar, lpar);
09516 $       if (res) return res;
09517         }
09518 
09519     static bool bkErased = false;
09520 
09521     switch (msg)
09522         {
09523         case WM_CREATE:         {$     _txCanvas_OnCREATE     (wnd);                return 0; }
09524 
09525         case WM_CLOSE:          {$ if (_txCanvas_OnCLOSE      (wnd))  break;   else return 0; }
09526         case WM_DESTROY:        {$     _txCanvas_OnDESTROY    (wnd);                return 0; }
09527 
09528         case WM_ERASEBKGND:     {$ if (!bkErased) { bkErased = true;  break; } else return 1; }
09529         case WM_SIZE:           {$                  bkErased = false; break;                  }
09530 
09531         case WM_PAINT:          {$     _txCanvas_OnPAINT      (wnd);                return 0; }
09532 
09533         case WM_TIMER:          {$     _txCanvas_OnTIMER      (wnd, wpar);          return 0; }
09534 
09535         case WM_KEYDOWN:        {$     _txCanvas_OnKEYDOWN    (wnd, wpar, lpar);    return 0; }
09536         case WM_CHAR:           {$     _txCanvas_OnCHAR       (wnd, wpar, lpar);    return 0; }
09537 
09538         case WM_LBUTTONUP:
09539         case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:
09540         case WM_RBUTTONUP:
09541         case WM_RBUTTONDOWN:
09542         case WM_MBUTTONUP:
09543         case WM_MBUTTONDOWN:
09544         case WM_MOUSEMOVE:      {$     _txCanvas_OnMOUSEMOVE  (wnd, wpar, lpar);    return 0; }
09545 
09546         case WM_MOUSELEAVE:     {$     _txCanvas_OnMOUSELEAVE (wnd);                return 0; }
09547 
09548         case _TX_WM_CREATEWND:  {$     _txCanvas_OnCREATEWND  (wnd, wpar, lpar);    return 0; }
09549         case _TX_WM_DESTROYWND: {$     _txCanvas_OnDESTROYWND (wnd, wpar, lpar);    return 0; }
09550 
09551         default: break;
09552         }
09553 
09554     if (msg == WM_SYSCOMMAND) switch (wpar)
09555         {
09556         case _TX_IDM_ABOUT:     {$       _txCanvas_OnCmdABOUT   (wnd, wpar);        return 0; }
09557         case _TX_IDM_CONSOLE:   {$       _txCanvas_OnCmdCONSOLE (wnd, wpar);        return 0; }
09558 
09559         default: break;
09560         }
09561 
09562 $   return DefWindowProc (wnd, msg, wpar, lpar);
09563     }
09564 
09565 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09566 
09567 bool _txCanvas_OnCREATE (HWND wnd)
09568     {
09569 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
09570 
09571 $   _txCanvas_BackBuf[0] = _txBuffer_Create (wnd, NULL, NULL, &_txCanvas_Pixels); assert (_txCanvas_BackBuf[0]);
09572 $   _txCanvas_BackBuf[1] = _txBuffer_Create (wnd, NULL, NULL, NULL);              assert (_txCanvas_BackBuf[1]);
09573 
09574 $   if (!SetTimer (wnd, _txCanvas_RefreshTimer, _txWindowUpdateInterval, NULL)) _txCanvas_RefreshTimer = 0;
09575 $   assert (_txCanvas_RefreshTimer);
09576 
09577 $   _txCanvas_UserDCs = new ::std::vector <HDC>;
09578 
09579 $   _txCanvas_Window = wnd;
09580 
09581 $   txSetDefaults();
09582 
09583 $   return true;
09584     }
09585 
09586 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09587 
09588 bool _txCanvas_OnDESTROY (HWND wnd)
09589     {
09590 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
09591 
09592     // Инициируем остановку цикла сообщений
09593 
09594 $   PostQuitMessage (_txRunning? WM_DESTROY : EXIT_SUCCESS);
09595 
09596 $   if (!_txCanvas_Window) return false;
09597 
09598     // Indicate that we are about to manually terminate
09599 
09600 $   _txExit = true;
09601 
09602     // Lock GDI resources
09603 
09604 $   bool locked = false;
09605 $   _txWaitFor ((locked = txLock (false), locked), _TX_TIMEOUT);
09606 $   if (!locked) TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Cannot lock GDI to free resources");
09607 
09608     // Освобождаем пользовательские ресурсы
09609 
09610 $   if (_txCanvas_UserDCs && !_txCanvas_UserDCs->empty())
09611         {
09612 $       txNotifyIcon (NIIF_ERROR, NULL, "Вы забыли освободить %d HDC.", (int) _txCanvas_UserDCs->size());
09613 $       Sleep (_TX_TIMEOUT);
09614 
09615 $       for (size_t i = 0; i < _txCanvas_UserDCs->size(); i++) _txBuffer_Delete (&_txCanvas_UserDCs->at (i));
09616 $       _txCanvas_UserDCs->clear();
09617         }
09618 
09619 $   delete _txCanvas_UserDCs; _txCanvas_UserDCs = NULL;
09620 
09621     // Освобождаем ресурсы, связанные с окном
09622 
09623 $   if (_txCanvas_RefreshTimer) KillTimer (wnd, _txCanvas_RefreshTimer) asserted;
09624 
09625 $   if (_txCanvas_BackBuf[1]) _txBuffer_Delete (&_txCanvas_BackBuf[1])  asserted;
09626 $   if (_txCanvas_BackBuf[0]) _txBuffer_Delete (&_txCanvas_BackBuf[0])  asserted;
09627 $   _txCanvas_Pixels = NULL;
09628 
09629 $   txUnlock();
09630 
09631     // Indicate that we are destroyed
09632 
09633 $   _txCanvas_Window = NULL;
09634 
09635 $   return true;
09636     }
09637 
09638 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09639 
09640 bool _txCanvas_OnCLOSE (HWND wnd)
09641     {
09642 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
09643 $   if (!_txCanvas_OK())           return false;
09644 
09645 $   if (_txMain && _txRunning &&
09646         txMessageBox ("Функция main() не завершена. Программа все еще работает. Прервать аварийно?\n\n"
09647                       "Лучше подождать, когда main() завершится - это отображается в заголовке окна.",
09648                       txGetModuleFileName (false), MB_YESNOCANCEL | MB_ICONSTOP) != IDYES) return false;
09649 $   return true;
09650     }
09651 
09652 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09653 
09654 bool _txCanvas_OnTIMER (HWND wnd, WPARAM)
09655     {
09656 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
09657 
09658 $   if (_txCanvas_RefreshLock > 0 || !_txRunning) return false;
09659 
09660 $   InvalidateRect (wnd, NULL, false) asserted;
09661 $   UpdateWindow   (wnd)              asserted;
09662 
09663 $   return true;
09664     }
09665 
09666 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09667 
09668 bool _txCanvas_OnPAINT (HWND wnd)
09669     {
09670 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
09671 $   if (!_txCanvas_OK())           return false;
09672 
09673 $   bool forceRedraw = GetAsyncKeyState (VK_MENU)  && GetAsyncKeyState (VK_CONTROL) &&
09674                        GetAsyncKeyState (VK_SHIFT) && GetAsyncKeyState (VK_SNAPSHOT);
09675 
09676 $   PAINTSTRUCT ps = {};
09677 $   HDC wndDc = BeginPaint (wnd, &ps);
09678 $   if (!wndDc) return false;
09679 
09680 $   HDC dc0 = _txCanvas_BackBuf[0],
09681         dc1 = _txCanvas_BackBuf[1];
09682 
09683 $   RECT r = {};
09684 $   GetClientRect (wnd, &r) asserted;
09685 $   POINT wndSize = { r.right - r.left, r.bottom - r.top };
09686 
09687 $   POINT dcSize = txGetExtent (dc1);
09688 
09689 $   if ((_txCanvas_RefreshLock <= 0 || forceRedraw) &&
09690         txLock (false))
09691         {
09692 $       Win32::BitBlt   (dc1, 0, 0, dcSize.x, dcSize.y, dc0, 0, 0, SRCCOPY);
09693 
09694 $       _txConsole_Draw (dc1);
09695 
09696 $       txUnlock();
09697         }
09698 
09699     // Magic 100500 value is used to completely block screen refresh.
09700     // Since no value can be 100500 or above, this condition is always true and the refresh cannot be blocked IRL.
09701     // Do not use 100501 because it may lead to errors on some compilers and possible may crash the compilers
09702     // themselves.
09703     // Yes guys, with all your software installed. :(
09704 
09705 $   if (_txCanvas_RefreshLock != 100500)
09706         {
09707         if (_txSwapBuffers)
09708             {
09709 $           _txSwapBuffers    (wndDc, 0, 0, wndSize.x, wndSize.y, dc1, 0, 0, dcSize.x, dcSize.y, SRCCOPY);
09710             }
09711         else if (dcSize.x == wndSize.x && dcSize.y == wndSize.y)
09712             {
09713 $           Win32::BitBlt     (wndDc, 0, 0, wndSize.x, wndSize.y, dc1, 0, 0,                     SRCCOPY);
09714             }
09715         else
09716             {
09717 $           Win32::SetStretchBltMode (wndDc, HALFTONE);
09718 $           Win32::StretchBlt (wndDc, 0, 0, wndSize.x, wndSize.y, dc1, 0, 0, dcSize.x, dcSize.y, SRCCOPY);
09719             }
09720         }
09721 
09722 $   EndPaint (wnd, &ps) asserted;
09723 
09724 $   return true;
09725     }
09726 
09727 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09728 
09729 bool _txCanvas_OnKEYDOWN (HWND, WPARAM vk, LPARAM info)
09730     {
09731 $8  INPUT_RECORD evt = {};
09732 
09733 $   evt.EventType                        = KEY_EVENT;
09734 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.bKeyDown          = true;
09735 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.wRepeatCount      = 1;
09736 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.uChar.AsciiChar   = (char)  MapVirtualKey ((WORD) vk, 2);   // 2 == MAPVK_VK_TO_CHAR
09737 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.wVirtualScanCode  = (WORD)  (info >> 16);
09738 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.wVirtualKeyCode   = (WORD)  vk;
09739 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.dwControlKeyState = (DWORD) (info & (1 << 24))? ENHANCED_KEY : 0;
09740 
09741 $   if (evt.Event.KeyEvent.uChar.AsciiChar) return false;  // Let TranslateMessage() and WM_CHAR do the job
09742 
09743 $   DWORD written = 0;
09744 $   WriteConsoleInput (GetStdHandle (STD_INPUT_HANDLE), &evt, 1, &written);
09745 
09746 $   return false;
09747     }
09748 
09749 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09750 
09751 bool _txCanvas_OnCHAR (HWND, WPARAM ch, LPARAM info)
09752     {
09753 $8  INPUT_RECORD evt = {};
09754 
09755 $   evt.EventType                        = KEY_EVENT;
09756 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.bKeyDown          = true;
09757 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.wRepeatCount      = 1;
09758 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.uChar.AsciiChar   = (char) (ch);
09759 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.wVirtualScanCode  = (WORD) (info >> 16);
09760 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.wVirtualKeyCode   = (WORD) MapVirtualKey ((WORD) (info >> 16), 3);  // 3 == MAPVK_VSC_TO_VK_EX
09761 $   evt.Event.KeyEvent.dwControlKeyState = 0;
09762 
09763 $   DWORD written = 0;
09764 $   WriteConsoleInput (GetStdHandle (STD_INPUT_HANDLE), &evt, 1, &written);
09765 
09766 $   return true;
09767     }
09768 
09769 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09770 
09771 bool _txCanvas_OnMOUSEMOVE (HWND wnd, WPARAM buttons, LPARAM coords)
09772     {
09773 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
09774 $   if (!_txCanvas_OK())           return false;
09775 
09776 $   if (_txMousePos.x == -1 && _txMousePos.y == -1)
09777         {
09778 $       TRACKMOUSEEVENT track = { sizeof (track), TME_HOVER | TME_LEAVE, wnd, HOVER_DEFAULT };
09779 $       TrackMouseEvent (&track);
09780         }
09781 
09782 $   _txMousePos.x   = LOWORD (coords);
09783 $   _txMousePos.y   = HIWORD (coords);
09784 $   _txMouseButtons = (unsigned) buttons;
09785 
09786 $   return true;
09787     }
09788 
09789 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09790 
09791 bool _txCanvas_OnMOUSELEAVE (HWND)
09792     {
09793 $8  _txMousePos.x   = -1;
09794 $   _txMousePos.y   = -1;
09795 $   _txMouseButtons = 0;
09796 
09797 $   return true;
09798     }
09799 
09800 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09801 
09802 bool _txCanvas_OnCREATEWND (HWND, WPARAM, LPARAM lpar)
09803     {
09804 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (lpar)) return false;
09805 
09806 $   const CREATESTRUCT* create = (CREATESTRUCT*) lpar;
09807 
09808 $   HWND wnd = CreateWindowEx (create->dwExStyle, create->lpszClass, create->lpszName, create->style,
09809                                create->x, create->y, create->cx, create->cy,
09810                                create->hwndParent, create->hMenu, NULL, create->lpCreateParams);
09811 
09812 $   *(HWND*) create->hInstance = wnd;
09813 
09814 $   return true;
09815     }
09816 
09817 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09818 
09819 bool _txCanvas_OnDESTROYWND (HWND, WPARAM, LPARAM lpar)
09820     {
09821 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (lpar)) return false;
09822 
09823 $   DestroyWindow ((HWND) lpar);
09824 
09825 $   return false;
09826     }
09827 
09828 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09829 
09830 bool _txCanvas_OnCmdCONSOLE (HWND wnd, WPARAM cmd)
09831     {
09832 $8  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (wnd)) return false;
09833 
09834 $   HWND console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
09835 $   if (!console) return false;
09836 
09837 $   bool visible = !!IsWindowVisible (console);
09838 
09839 $   ShowWindow (console, visible? SW_HIDE : SW_SHOW);
09840 
09841 $   visible = !!IsWindowVisible (console);
09842 $   CheckMenuItem (GetSystemMenu (wnd, false), (int) cmd, visible? MF_CHECKED : MF_UNCHECKED);
09843 
09844 $   return true;
09845     }
09846 
09847 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09848 
09849 bool _txCanvas_OnCmdABOUT (HWND, WPARAM)
09850     {
09851 $8  //{ Overriding the missing names, if the set is uncomplete
09852 
09853     #if defined (__MODULE)
09854         #define ABOUT_NAME_    __MODULE
09855     #else
09856         #define ABOUT_NAME_    "TXLib"
09857     #endif
09858 
09859     #if defined (__MODULE) || defined (__VERSION) || defined (__DESCRIPTION) || defined (__AUTHOR)
09860 
09861         #ifndef __MODULE
09862         #define __MODULE       "TXLib"                           "\n"  "#define __MODULE to set the name.\n"
09863         #endif
09864 
09865         #ifndef __VERSION
09866         #define __VERSION      "(0.000000000)."                  "\n" "#define __VERSION to set the string value.\n"
09867         #endif
09868 
09869         #ifndef __DESCRIPTION
09870         #define __DESCRIPTION  "(Да, мне лень задать описание)." "\n" "#define __DESCRIPTION to override project role.\n"
09871         #endif
09872 
09873         #ifndef __AUTHOR
09874         #define __AUTHOR       "(Непонятно кто)."                "\n" "#define __AUTHOR to override this name."
09875         #endif
09876 
09877     #endif
09878     //}
09879 
09880 $   static char text[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
09881 
09882 $   _tx_snprintf_s (text, sizeof (text) - 1,
09883 
09884                     "Application:\n\n"
09885 
09886                     #if defined (__MODULE) || defined (__VERSION) || defined (__DESCRIPTION) || defined (__AUTHOR)
09887                         __MODULE " version " __VERSION "\n" __DESCRIPTION "\n" "Copyright (c) " __AUTHOR "\n"
09888                     #else
09889                         "Здесь могла бы быть Ваша реклама :)\n"
09890                         "#define __MODULE to \"your program name\" before including TXLib.h to use this billboard...\n"
09891                     #endif
09892 
09893                     "\n" "%s", _txAppInfo());
09894 
09895 $   txMessageBox (text, "About " ABOUT_NAME_, MB_ICONINFORMATION);
09896 
09897     // And a bit of HTTP-code in C++ function:
09898 
09899     goto http;
09900     http://sizeof.livejournal.com
09901 
09902 $   return true;
09903 
09904     #undef ABOUT_NAME_
09905     }
09906 
09907 #endif // TX_COMPILED
09908 
09910 //}
09911 //=================================================================================================================
09912 
09913 //=================================================================================================================
09914 //{          Console-support functions           (_txConsole...)
09916 //=================================================================================================================
09918 
09919 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
09920 
09921 HWND _txConsole_Attach()
09922     {
09923 $1  HWND console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
09924 
09925 $   if (!console)
09926         {
09927 $       FreeConsole();
09928 $       AllocConsole();
09929         }
09930 
09931 $   console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
09932 $   if (!console) return NULL;
09933 
09934 $   txSetLocale();                                // Устанавливаем русскую кодовую страницу для консоли Windows
09935 
09936 $   static bool done = false;
09937 $   if (done) return console;
09938 
09939 $   _txConsole_SetUnicodeFont();                  // Впечатлительным лучше сюда не смотреть.
09940 
09941 $   if (!_txIsConsoleSubsystem())
09942         {$ txReopenStdio(); }                     // Переоткрываем потоки ввода-вывода, если subsystem != console
09943 
09944     // That's all, folks
09945 
09946 $   done = true;
09947 $   return console;
09948     }
09949 
09950 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09951 
09952 int txSetLocale (int codepage /*= _TX_CODEPAGE*/,
09953                  const char locale[] /*= _TX_LOCALE*/, const wchar_t wLocale[] /*= _TX_WLOCALE*/)
09954     {
09955 $1  int oldPage = GetConsoleOutputCP();
09956 
09957     // Устанавливаем нужную кодовую страницу для консоли Windows
09958 
09959 $   if (codepage)
09960         {
09961 $       SetConsoleCP       (codepage);
09962 $       SetConsoleOutputCP (codepage);
09963         }
09964 
09965     // Устанавливаем нужную кодовую страницу для стандартной библиотеки, иначе не будут работать Unicode-версии
09966     // функций (wprintf, ...). Если компилите с помощью gcc и собираетесь использовать L"unicode-строки" с определенным
09967     // языком, укажите опции в командной строке компилятора g++: -finput-charset=NNNN -fexec-charset=NNNN, где NNNN -
09968     // обозначение кодовой страницы (например, для русского языка - CP1251).
09969 
09970 $   if (locale)
09971         {
09972 $       setlocale (LC_ALL,     locale);
09973 $       setlocale (LC_NUMERIC, "C");              // Return to decimal point (3.14) instead of comma (3,14) in floating numbers
09974         }
09975 
09976     #ifndef __CYGWIN__
09977 
09978 $   const bool wine = !!Win32::wine_get_version;  // Linux::Wine v1.2.2+ compatibility.
09979 
09980 $   if (wLocale && !wine)
09981         {
09982 $       _wsetlocale (LC_ALL,     wLocale);
09983 $       _wsetlocale (LC_NUMERIC, L"C");           // L"C" (see above)
09984         }
09985 
09986     #endif
09987 
09988     (void) wLocale;
09989 
09990 $   return oldPage;
09991     }
09992 
09993 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
09994 
09995 void txReopenStdio()
09996     {
09997 $1  // Переоткрываем заново <s>Америку</s> потоки ввода-вывода
09998 
09999     #ifndef __CYGWIN__
10000 
10001 $   *stdin  =                  *_fdopen (_open_osfhandle ((intptr_t) GetStdHandle (STD_INPUT_HANDLE),  _O_TEXT), "r");
10002 $   fflush (stdout); *stdout = *_fdopen (_open_osfhandle ((intptr_t) GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE), _O_TEXT), "w");
10003 $   fflush (stderr); *stderr = *_fdopen (_open_osfhandle ((intptr_t) GetStdHandle (STD_ERROR_HANDLE),  _O_TEXT), "w");
10004 
10005     #else
10006 $                    *stdin  = *_fdopen (STDIN_FILENO,  "r");
10007 $   fflush (stdout); *stdout = *_fdopen (STDOUT_FILENO, "w");
10008 $   fflush (stderr); *stderr = *_fdopen (STDERR_FILENO, "w");
10009 
10010     #endif
10011 
10012 $   setvbuf (stdin,  NULL, _IONBF, 0);
10013 $   setvbuf (stdout, NULL, _IONBF, 0);
10014 $   setvbuf (stderr, NULL, _IONBF, 0);
10015 
10016 $   ::std::ios::sync_with_stdio();
10017     }
10018 
10019 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10020 
10021 inline bool _txConsole_OK()
10022     {
10023     return Win32::GetConsoleWindow() != NULL;
10024     }
10025 
10026 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10027 
10028 bool _txConsole_Detach (bool activate)
10029     {
10030 $1  HWND console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
10031 $   if (!console) return false;
10032 
10033 $   EnableWindow (console, true);
10034 $   ShowWindow   (console, SW_SHOW);
10035 
10036 $   if (activate)
10037         {
10038 $       SetForegroundWindow (console);
10039 $       BringWindowToTop    (console);
10040         }
10041 
10042 $   return !!FreeConsole();
10043     }
10044 
10045 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10046 
10047 bool _txConsole_Draw (HDC dc)
10048     {
10049 $8  if (_TX_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return false;
10050 
10051 $   HANDLE out = GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);
10052 
10053 $   CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO con = {};
10054 $   BOOL ok = GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo (out, &con);
10055 $   if (!ok) return false;
10056 
10057 $   POINT size = { con.srWindow.Right  - con.srWindow.Left + 1,
10058                    con.srWindow.Bottom - con.srWindow.Top  + 1 };
10059 
10060 $   SIZE fontSz = { 12, 16 };
10061 $   Win32::GetTextExtentPoint32 (dc, "W", 1, &fontSz) asserted;
10062 
10063 $   COLORREF pal [16] = { 0x000000, 0x800000, 0x008000, 0x808000, 0x000080, 0x800080, 0x008080, 0xC0C0C0,
10064                           0x808080, 0xFF0000, 0x00FF00, 0xFFFF00, 0x0000FF, 0xFF00FF, 0x00FFFF, 0xFFFFFF };
10065 
10066 $   for (short y = 0; y < size.y; y++)
10067         {
10068         static char chr [_TX_BUFSIZE + 1] = "";  // [con.dwSize.X + 1]; maybe will be truncated
10069         static WORD atr [_TX_BUFSIZE + 1] = {}; // [con.dwSize.X + 1]; maybe will be truncated
10070         COORD coord = { (short) (con.srWindow.Left), (short) (y + con.srWindow.Top) };
10071         DWORD read  = 0;
10072 
10073         if (!ReadConsoleOutputCharacter (out, chr, sizearr (chr) - 1, coord, &read)) continue;
10074         if (!ReadConsoleOutputAttribute (out, atr, sizearr (atr) - 1, coord, &read)) continue;
10075 
10076         for (int x = 0, xEnd = size.x; x < size.x; x = xEnd)
10077             {
10078             Win32::SetTextColor (dc, pal [ atr[x]       & 0x0F]);
10079             Win32::SetBkColor   (dc, pal [(atr[x] >> 4) & 0x0F]);
10080             Win32::SetBkMode    (dc,      (atr[x]       & 0xF0)? OPAQUE : TRANSPARENT);
10081 
10082             for (xEnd = x+1; xEnd < size.x && atr[xEnd] == atr[x]; xEnd++) {;}
10083 
10084             Win32::TextOut (dc, ROUND (fontSz.cx * (x + con.srWindow.Left)),
10085                                 ROUND (fontSz.cy *  y), chr + x, xEnd - x) asserted;
10086             }
10087         }
10088 
10089 $   Win32::SetTextColor (dc, pal [ con.wAttributes       & 0x0F]);
10090 $   Win32::SetBkColor   (dc, pal [(con.wAttributes >> 4) & 0x0F]);
10091 $   Win32::SetBkMode    (dc, TRANSPARENT);
10092 
10093 $   if (_txConsole_IsBlinking &&
10094         In (con.dwCursorPosition, con.srWindow) &&
10095         GetTickCount() % _txCursorBlinkInterval*2 > _txCursorBlinkInterval &&
10096         GetForegroundWindow() == txWindow())
10097         {
10098 $       Win32::TextOut (dc, ROUND (fontSz.cx * (con.dwCursorPosition.X - con.srWindow.Left)),
10099                             ROUND (fontSz.cy * (con.dwCursorPosition.Y - con.srWindow.Top)) + 1,
10100                             "_", 1) asserted;
10101         }
10102 
10103 $   return true;
10104     }
10105 
10106 #endif // TX_COMPILED
10107 
10108 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10109 //{          Welcome to the Duck Side! Together we will rule the Bathroom!
10110 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10111 
10112 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
10113 
10114 bool _txConsole_SetUnicodeFont()
10115     {
10116 $   const bool wine = !!Win32::wine_get_version;  // Linux::Wine v1.2.2+ compatibility.
10117                                                   // Beer compatibility may be added in future versions...
10118 $   if (wine)                                     // Минздрав РФ предупреждает: чрезмерное употребление wine
10119         {                                         // вредит Вашему здоровью.
10120 $       Win32::GetNumberOfConsoleFonts = NULL;
10121 $       Win32::GetCurrentConsoleFont   = NULL;
10122 $       Win32::SetConsoleFont          = NULL;
10123 
10124 $       return false;
10125         }
10126 
10127     // Начиная с Висты все хорошо...
10128 
10129 $1  if (Win32::GetCurrentConsoleFontEx && Win32::SetCurrentConsoleFontEx)
10130         {
10131 $       HANDLE out = GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);
10132 
10133 $       Win32::CONSOLE_FONT_INFOEX info = { sizeof (info) };
10134 $       if (!Win32::GetCurrentConsoleFontEx (out, false, &info)) return false;
10135 
10136 $       info.FontFamily = 0x36;                                                    // Unicode fixed-pitch
10137 $       if (!*info.FaceName) info.dwFontSize.Y = (SHORT) (info.dwFontSize.Y + 2);  // Terminal font is too small
10138 
10139 $       if (wcsncmp (info.FaceName, L"Consolas", sizearr (info.FaceName)) != 0)    // Consolas is allowed too
10140             {$ wcsncpy_s (info.FaceName, sizearr (info.FaceName), L"Lucida Console", sizearr (info.FaceName)); }
10141 
10142 $       return !!Win32::SetCurrentConsoleFontEx (out, false, &info);
10143         }
10144 
10145     // ...а до этого все не так сладко
10146 
10147 $   const unsigned uniFont = 10;                  // The Internet and W2K sources know this magic number
10148 $   const unsigned uniSize = 20;                  // Size of the font desired, should be > max # of Raster Fonts
10149 $   bool ok = true;
10150 
10151     // Force Windows to use Unicode font by creating and run the console shortcut tuned to use that font.
10152 
10153 $   HANDLE out = GetStdHandle (STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);
10154 
10155 $   unsigned fonts = _TX_CALL (Win32::GetNumberOfConsoleFonts, ());
10156 $   if (fonts && fonts <= uniFont)
10157         {
10158 $       HRESULT init = Win32::CoInitialize (NULL);
10159 $       size_t sz = 0;
10160 
10161 $       char link [MAX_PATH] = "";
10162 $       getenv_s (&sz, link, sizeof (link) - 1, "TEMP");
10163 $       strncat_s (link, sizeof (link), "\\~txLink.lnk", sizeof (link) - 1);
10164 
10165 $       char comspec [MAX_PATH] = "";
10166 $       getenv_s (&sz, comspec, sizeof (comspec), "COMSPEC");
10167 
10168 $       (void) _unlink (link);
10169 
10170 $       _txCreateShortcut (link, comspec, "/c exit", NULL, NULL, SW_SHOWMINNOACTIVE, NULL, 0, uniSize) asserted;
10171 
10172 $       ok = (Win32::ShellExecuteA (NULL, NULL, link, NULL, NULL, SW_SHOWMINNOACTIVE) > (void*)32);  // Sic!
10173         if (ok) {$ _txWaitFor (FindWindow (NULL, "~txLink"), _TX_TIMEOUT); }
10174 
10175 $       (void) _unlink (link);
10176 
10177 $       if (init == S_OK) Win32::CoUninitialize();
10178         }
10179 
10180     // If Unicode font is not already set, do set it.
10181 
10182 $   Win32::CONSOLE_FONT_INFO cur = {};
10183 $   _TX_CALL (Win32::GetCurrentConsoleFont, (out, false, &cur));
10184 
10185 $   ok &= (cur.nFont >= uniFont);
10186     if (!ok) {$ ok &= _TX_CALL (Win32::SetConsoleFont, (out, uniFont)); }
10187 
10188 $   HWND console = Win32::GetConsoleWindow();
10189 $   InvalidateRect (console, NULL, false);
10190 $   UpdateWindow   (console);
10191 
10192 $   return ok;
10193     }
10194 
10195 #endif // TX_COMPILED
10196 
10197 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10198 //{          The assistants to the nightmare. You can use it freely to make your own nightmare sweet.
10199 
10200 #define      _TX_TRY                { goto __tx_try; } __tx_try: { int __tx_error = S_OK; (void)__tx_error;
10201 #define      _TX_CHECKED( cmd )     { if (FAILED (__tx_error = (cmd))) goto __tx_catch; }
10202 #define      _TX_FAIL               { __tx_error = E_FAIL; goto __tx_catch; }
10203 #define      _TX_RETRY              { __tx_error = S_OK;   goto __tx_try;   }
10204 #define      _TX_OK                 ( SUCCEEDED (__tx_error) )
10205 #define      _TX_CATCH              goto __tx_finally; __tx_catch:
10206 #define      _TX_RETURN             goto __tx_finally;
10207 #define      _TX_FINALLY            __tx_finally:
10208 #define      _TX_ENDTRY             }
10209 
10210 //}
10211 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10212 
10213 // Мало не покажется
10214 
10215 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
10216 
10217 bool _txCreateShortcut (const char shortcutName[],
10218                         const char fileToLink[], const char args[] /*= NULL*/, const char workDir[] /*= NULL*/,
10219                         const char description[] /*= NULL*/, int cmdShow /*= SW_SHOWNORMAL*/, const char iconFile[] /*= NULL*/, int iconIndex /*= 0*/,
10220                         int fontSize /*= 0*/, COORD bufSize /*= ZERO (COORD)*/, COORD wndSize /*= ZERO (COORD)*/, COORD wndOrg /*=ZERO (COORD)*/)
10221     {
10222 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (shortcutName && *shortcutName)) return false;
10223 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (fileToLink   && *fileToLink))   return false;
10224 
10225 $   IShellLink* shellLink = NULL;
10226 $   Win32::IShellLinkDataList* dataList = NULL;
10227 $   IPersistFile* file = NULL;
10228 
10229 $   HRESULT init = Win32::CoInitialize (NULL);
10230 
10231     _TX_TRY
10232         {
10233 $       _TX_CHECKED (Win32::CoCreateInstance (CLSID_ShellLink, NULL, CLSCTX_INPROC_SERVER, Win32::IID_IShellLink, (void**) &shellLink));
10234 $       if (!shellLink) _TX_FAIL;
10235 
10236 $       shellLink->SetPath (fileToLink);
10237 $       shellLink->SetArguments (args);
10238 $       shellLink->SetWorkingDirectory (workDir);
10239 $       shellLink->SetDescription (description);
10240 $       shellLink->SetShowCmd (cmdShow);
10241 $       shellLink->SetIconLocation (iconFile, iconIndex);
10242 
10243 $       _TX_CHECKED (shellLink->QueryInterface (Win32::IID_IShellLinkDataList, (void**) &dataList));
10244 $       if (!dataList) _TX_FAIL;
10245 
10246 $       Win32::NT_CONSOLE_PROPS props =
10247           {{sizeof (props), NT_CONSOLE_PROPS_SIG},
10248 
10249             FOREGROUND_LIGHTGRAY,                       // wFillAttribute
10250             FOREGROUND_MAGENTA | BACKGROUND_WHITE,      // wPopupFillAttribute
10251            {bufSize.X, bufSize.Y},                      // dwScreenBufferSize
10252            {wndSize.X, wndSize.Y},                      // dwWindowSize
10253            {wndOrg.X,  wndOrg.Y},                       // dwWindowOrigin
10254             0,                                          // nFont
10255             0,                                          // nInputBufferSize
10256            {0, (short) fontSize},                       // dwFontSize
10257             0x36, 400, L"Lucida Console",               // uFontFamily, uFontWeight, FaceName. We're dancing for this!
10258             15,                                         // uCursorSize
10259             0,  1, 1, 0,                                // bFullScreen, bQuickEdit, bInsertMode, bAutoPosition
10260             50, 4, 0,                                   // uHistoryBufferSize, uNumberOfHistoryBuffers, bHistoryNoDup
10261 
10262            {0x000000, 0x800000, 0x008000, 0x808000, 0x000080, 0x800080, 0x008080, 0xC0C0C0,  // Palette
10263             0x808080, 0xFF0000, 0x00FF00, 0xFFFF00, 0x0000FF, 0xFF00FF, 0x00FFFF, 0xFFFFFF}
10264             };
10265 
10266 $       _TX_CHECKED (dataList->AddDataBlock (&props));
10267 
10268 $       _TX_CHECKED (shellLink->QueryInterface (Win32::IID_IPersistFile, (void**) &file));
10269 $       if (!file) _TX_FAIL;
10270 
10271 $       wchar_t wName[MAX_PATH] = L"";
10272 $       MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, shortcutName, -1, wName, MAX_PATH) || ZeroMemory (wName, sizeof (wName));
10273 
10274 $       _TX_CHECKED (file->Save (wName, true));
10275         }
10276 
10277 $   _TX_CATCH
10278 $   _TX_FINALLY
10279 
10280 $   if (file)      file     ->Release();
10281 $   if (dataList)  dataList ->Release();
10282 $   if (shellLink) shellLink->Release();
10283 
10284 $   if (init == S_OK) Win32::CoUninitialize();
10285 
10286 $   return _TX_OK;
10287     _TX_ENDTRY
10288     }
10289 
10290 #endif // TX_COMPILED
10291 
10292 //}
10293 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10294 
10296 //}
10297 //=================================================================================================================
10298 
10299 //=================================================================================================================
10300 //{          Memory DC functions                 (_txBuffer...)
10302 //=================================================================================================================
10304 
10305 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
10306 
10307 HDC _txBuffer_Create (HWND wnd, const POINT* size /*= NULL*/, HBITMAP bitmap /*= NULL*/, RGBQUAD** pixels /*= NULL*/)
10308     {
10309 $1  txAutoLock _lock;
10310 
10311 $   HDC wndDC = GetDC (wnd);
10312 $   if (!wndDC) return NULL;
10313 
10314 $   POINT sz = { 1, 1 };
10315 $   if (size) sz = *size;
10316 
10317 $   if (!size && wnd)
10318         {
10319 $       RECT r = {};
10320 $       GetClientRect (wnd, &r) asserted;
10321 
10322 $       sz.x = r.right  - r.left;
10323 $       sz.y = r.bottom - r.top;
10324         }
10325 
10326 $   if (bitmap)
10327         {
10328 $       BITMAP bmap = {};
10329 $       Win32::GetObject (bitmap, sizeof (bmap), &bmap) asserted;
10330 
10331 $       sz.x = bmap.bmWidth;
10332 $       sz.y = bmap.bmHeight;
10333         }
10334 
10335 $   HDC dc = Win32::CreateCompatibleDC (wndDC);
10336 $   if (!dc) TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Cannot create buffer: CreateCompatibleDC() failed");
10337 
10338 $   BITMAPINFO info = {{ sizeof (info), sz.x, sz.y, 1, WORD (sizeof (RGBQUAD) * 8), BI_RGB }};
10339 
10340 $   HBITMAP bmap = bitmap? bitmap : Win32::CreateDIBSection (NULL, &info, DIB_RGB_COLORS, (void**) pixels, NULL, 0);
10341 $   if (!bmap) TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Cannot create buffer: CreateCompatibleBitmap() failed");
10342 
10343 $   Win32::SelectObject (dc, bmap) asserted;
10344 
10345 $   if (!bitmap) Win32::PatBlt (dc, 0, 0, sz.x, sz.y, BLACKNESS) asserted;
10346 
10347 $   ReleaseDC (wnd, wndDC) asserted;
10348 
10349 $   return dc;
10350     }
10351 
10352 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10353 
10354 bool _txBuffer_Delete (HDC* dc)
10355     {
10356 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (dc)) return false;
10357 $   if (!*dc) return false;
10358 
10359 $   if (_TX_HDC_FAILED (*dc)) return false;
10360 
10361 $   if (!Win32::GetObjectType (Win32::GetCurrentObject (*dc, OBJ_BITMAP))) return false;
10362 
10363 $   txAutoLock _lock;
10364 
10365 $   _txBuffer_Select (Win32::GetStockObject (NULL_PEN),    *dc) asserted;
10366 $   _txBuffer_Select (Win32::GetStockObject (NULL_BRUSH),  *dc) asserted;
10367 $   _txBuffer_Select (Win32::GetStockObject (SYSTEM_FONT), *dc) asserted;
10368 $   _txBuffer_Select (_txStockBitmap,                      *dc);
10369 
10370 $   Win32::DeleteObject (Win32::GetCurrentObject (*dc, OBJ_BITMAP)) asserted;
10371 
10372 $   Win32::DeleteDC (*dc) asserted;
10373 
10374 $   *dc = NULL;
10375 
10376 $   return true;
10377     }
10378 
10379 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10380 
10381 bool _txBuffer_Select (HGDIOBJ obj, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
10382     {
10383 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (obj)) return false;
10384 $   if (_TX_HDC_FAILED      (dc))  return false;
10385 
10386 $   if (!Win32::GetObjectType (obj)) TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Invalid GDI object type");
10387 
10388 $   txAutoLock _lock;
10389 
10390 $   obj = Win32::SelectObject (dc, obj);
10391 $   if (obj) Win32::DeleteObject (obj);
10392 
10393 $   return obj != NULL;
10394     }
10395 
10396 #endif // TX_COMPILED
10397 
10399 //}
10400 //=================================================================================================================
10401 
10402 //=================================================================================================================
10403 //{          Diagnostics
10405 //=================================================================================================================
10407 
10408 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
10409 
10410 const char* _txError (const char file[] /*= NULL*/, int line /*= 0*/, const char func[] /*= NULL*/, unsigned color /*= 0*/,
10411                       const char msg [] /*= NULL*/, ...)
10412     {                                                                        //---/\---/\-------Это ASCII KOT!--//
10413 $1  va_list arg; va_start (arg, msg);                                        //  {  '-'  }                      //
10414 $$  const char* what = _txProcessError (file, line, func, color, msg, arg);  //  {  0 0  }     Добавь его себе  //
10415     va_end (arg);                                                            //  --> V <--  в исходник, и тебе  //
10416                                                                              //   \ \|/ /      будет, наверно,  //
10417     if (!(msg && msg[0] == '\a')) return what;                               //    \___/  приятно отлаживаться  //
10418                                                                              //---------------долгими ночами:)--//
10419 //  vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv
10420     DebugBreak();   // >>> Котики, вы в отладчике. Не пугайтесь. Есть шанс посмотреть переменные и разобраться.
10421 //  ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
10422 
10423     return what;    // >>> Уходите из функции пошаговой отладкой (F10/F11). Следите за стеком вызовов (Alt+7).
10424     }
10425 
10426 #endif // TX_COMPILED
10427 
10428 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10429 //{          General runtime check hooks
10430 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10431 
10432 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
10433 
10434 void _txOnSignal (int sig /*= 0*/, int fpe /*= 0*/)
10435     {
10436 $1  if (!sig && !fpe)
10437         {
10438 $       signal (SIGSEGV, (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10439 $       signal (SIGFPE,  (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10440 $       signal (SIGABRT, (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10441 $       signal (SIGILL,  (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10442 $       signal (SIGTERM, (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal) != SIG_ERR asserted;
10443 $       return;
10444         }
10445 
10446     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (%d, %d) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, sig, fpe);
10447 
10448     #define GET_DESCR_(str, code, descr)  case (code): {$ (str) = " " #code ": " descr; break; }
10449 
10450 $   const char* sSig = "Неизвестный тип сигнала";
10451 
10452 $   switch (sig)
10453         {
10454         GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGSEGV, "Доступ по неверному указателю. Ставьте ассерты!")
10455         GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGILL,  "Попытка выполнить недопустимую операцию. Проверьте указатели на функции.")
10456         GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGABRT, "Аварийное завершение программы, вызвана функция abort().")
10457         GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGTERM, "Получен сигнал принудительного завершения программы.")
10458         GET_DESCR_ (sSig, SIGFPE,  "Грубая ошибка в вычислениях.")
10459         default:   break;
10460         }
10461 
10462 $   const char* sFPE = "";
10463 
10464     #if defined (_MSC_VER)
10465 
10466     // MSVC provides the FPE code as a MS extension.
10467     // See: https://msdn.microsoft.com/ru-ru/library/xdkz3x12.aspx
10468 
10469 $   if (sig == SIGFPE) switch (fpe)
10470         {
10471         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_INVALID,        "Результат неверен.")
10472         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_DENORMAL,       "Денормализация.")
10473         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_ZERODIVIDE,     "Деление на ноль.")
10474         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_OVERFLOW,       "Результат слишком большой.")
10475         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_UNDERFLOW,      "Результат слишком маленький.")
10476         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_INEXACT,        "Результат неточен.")
10477         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_UNEMULATED,     "Операция не поддерживается.")
10478         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_SQRTNEG,        "Квадратный корень из отрицательного числа.")
10479         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_STACKOVERFLOW,  "Переполнение стека сопроцессора.")
10480         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_STACKUNDERFLOW, "В стеке сопроцессора не хватает данных.")
10481         GET_DESCR_ (sFPE, _FPE_EXPLICITGEN,    "Явный вызов исключения.")
10482         default:   break;
10483         }
10484 
10485     #else
10486 $   fpe = 0;
10487     #endif
10488 
10489     #undef GET_DESCR_
10490 
10491 $   signal (sig, (void(*)(int))(uintptr_t)_txOnSignal);
10492 
10493 $   Win32::_fpreset();
10494 
10495 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a\t"
10496                     "signal (%d, 0x%02X):%s%s "
10497                     "%s%s"
10498                     "С помощью функции signal() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.",
10499                     sig, (unsigned) fpe, sSig, sFPE,
10500                     ((_txDumpSE[1] == '\n')? "" : "\n\n"), _txDumpSE + 1);
10501     }
10502 
10503 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10504 
10505 void _txOnTerminate()
10506     {
10507     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s() called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__);
10508 
10509     // From: http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc%2B%2B-v3/libsupc%2B%2B/vterminate.cc
10510 
10511 $1  static int terminating = 0;
10512     if (terminating++) {$ _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a" "std::terminate() вызвана рекурсивно."); return; }
10513 
10514 $   if (!*_txDumpSE)
10515         {$ _txDumpExceptionCPP (_txDumpSE + 1, sizeof (_txDumpSE) - 2); }
10516 
10517 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\t\a"
10518                     "std::terminate(): Неперехваченное исключение в функции main() или в деструкторе, "
10519                     "или другая фатальная ошибка C++. "
10520                     "%s"
10521                     "Используйте try/catch блоки, перехватывайте catch (...), проверяйте вызовы виртуальных функций, "
10522                     "разбирайтесь, в чем дело.\n\n"
10523                     "С помощью std::set_terminate() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку." + !*_txDumpSE,
10524                     _txDumpSE + 1);
10525     }
10526 
10527 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10528 
10529 void _txOnUnexpected()
10530     {
10531     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s() called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__);
10532 
10533 $1  if (!*_txDumpSE)
10534         {$ _txDumpExceptionCPP (_txDumpSE + 1, sizeof (_txDumpSE) - 2); }
10535 
10536 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("std::unexpected(): Необработанное исключение.\n\n"
10537                     "Проверьте свои catch-блоки. Перехватите catch (...). Если вы (зря) используете "
10538                     "спецификацию исключений для функций, проверьте, не нарушена ли она."
10539                     "%s"
10540                     "С помощью catch (...) в main() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.",
10541                     _txDumpSE + 1);
10542     }
10543 
10544 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10545 
10546 int _txOnMatherr (_exception* exc)
10547     {
10548     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (0x%p) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, exc);
10549 
10550 $1  assert (exc);
10551 
10552     const char* sType = "Неизвестный тип исключения";
10553 
10554     #if !defined (__CYGWIN__)
10555 
10556     #define GET_DESCR_(code, descr)  case (code): {$ sType = "(" #code "): " descr; break; }
10557 
10558 $   switch (exc->type)
10559         {
10560         GET_DESCR_ (_DOMAIN,    "Нарушение области определения");
10561         GET_DESCR_ (_SING,      "Сингулярность аргумента");
10562         GET_DESCR_ (_PLOSS,     "Частичная потеря значимости");
10563         GET_DESCR_ (_TLOSS,     "Полная потеря значимости");
10564         GET_DESCR_ (_OVERFLOW,  "Результат слишком большой");
10565         GET_DESCR_ (_UNDERFLOW, "Результат слишком маленький");
10566         default:   break;
10567         }
10568 
10569     #undef GET_DESCR_
10570 
10571 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("_matherr(): Математическая ошибка %d %s в функции %s (%lg, [%lg]). Она вернет значение %lg.\n\n"
10572                     "С помощью __setusermatherr() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.",
10573                     exc->type, sType, exc->name, exc->arg1, exc->arg2, exc->retval);
10574     #else
10575 
10576 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("_matherr(): Математическая ошибка: %s.", sType);
10577 
10578     #endif
10579 
10580     return 0;
10581     }
10582 
10583 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10584 
10585 tx_noreturn void _txOnNewHandlerAnsi()
10586     {
10587     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s() called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__);
10588 $1
10589 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("operator new: Ошибка выделения памяти.\n\n"
10590                     "С помощью std::set_new_handler() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку "
10591                     "и где-нибудь найти недостающую память.");
10592 
10593 $   throw std::bad_alloc();
10594     }
10595 
10596 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10597 
10598 void _txOnSecurityErrorAnsi (const char* msg, void* ptr, int code)
10599     {
10600     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (%s, 0x%p, %d) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, msg, ptr, code);
10601 
10602 $1  if (code)
10603         {$ errno = code; }
10604 
10605 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a"
10606                     "Ошибка переполнения буфера %d: %s в %.20s (0x%p). Ставьте ассерты!\n\n"
10607                     "С помощью std::set_constraint_handler_s() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку "
10608                     "и постараться не выходить за границы массивов.",
10609                     code, msg, (char*) ptr, ptr);
10610     }
10611 
10612 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10613 
10614 int tx_glGetError (int setError /*= INT_MIN*/)
10615     {
10616 $1  return _txOGLError = (setError == INT_MIN)? _TX_CALL (Win32::glGetError, ()) : setError;
10617     }
10618 
10619 #endif // TX_COMPILED

10624 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10625 //{          MSC Runtime check hooks
10626 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10627 
10628 #if defined (_MSC_VER)
10629 
10630 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
10631 
10632 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10633 
10634 int _txOnNewHandler (size_t size)
10635     {
10636     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (0x%p) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, (void*)(uintptr_t) size);
10637 $5
10638 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("operator new: Ошибка выделения %llu байт памяти.\n\n"
10639                     "С помощью _set_new_handler() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку "
10640                     "и где-нибудь найти недостающую память.", (unsigned long long) size);
10641 
10642 $   throw std::bad_alloc();
10643     }
10644 
10645 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10646 
10647 void _txOnSecurityError (int code, void* addr)
10648     {
10649     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (%d, 0x%p) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, code, addr);
10650 $5
10651 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a"
10652                     "Ошибка переполнения буфера %d (_SECERR_BUFFER_OVERRUN). Ставьте ассерты!\n\n"
10653                     "С помощью _set_security_error_handler() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку "
10654                     "и более торжественно завершить программу. Ставьте же ассерты.", code);
10655     }
10656 
10657 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10658 
10659 void _txOnPureCall()
10660     {
10661     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s() called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__);
10662 $5
10663 $   _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a"
10664                     "Вызвана чисто виртуальная функция. Такое бывает, например, в конструкторах "
10665                     "или деструкторах базовых классов - не вызывайте там таких функций.\n\n"
10666                     "С помощью _set_purecall_handler() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку "
10667                     "и проверить свое знание С++ :)");
10668     }
10669 
10670 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10671 
10672 void _txOnInvalidParam (const wchar_t* wExpr, const wchar_t* wFunc, const wchar_t* wFile, unsigned int line, uintptr_t addr)
10673     {
10674     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (%S, %S, %S, %d, 0x%p) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, wExpr, wFunc, wFile, line, addr);
10675 
10676 $5  assert (wExpr);
10677     assert (wFunc);
10678     assert (wFile);
10679 
10680     char expr [_TX_BUFSIZE/2] = "[Unknowm expr]",
10681          func [_TX_BUFSIZE/2] = "[Unknowm func]",
10682          file [MAX_PATH]      = "[Unknowm file]";
10683 
10684 $   WideCharToMultiByte (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, wExpr, -1, expr, sizeof (expr) - 1, NULL, NULL);
10685 $   WideCharToMultiByte (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, wFunc, -1, func, sizeof (func) - 1, NULL, NULL);
10686 $   WideCharToMultiByte (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, wFile, -1, file, sizeof (file) - 1, NULL, NULL);
10687 
10688 $$  _txError (file, (int) line, func, 0, "\a"
10689               "В функцию %s передан неверный параметр: неверно, что %s. Не надо так.\n\n"
10690               "С помощью _set_invalid_parameter_handler() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.", func, expr);
10691     }
10692 
10693 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10694 
10695 #if defined (_CLANG_VER) && !defined (_MSC_VER)
10696 
10697 void _txLibCppDebugFunction (std::__libcpp_debug_info const& info)
10698     {
10699 $5  assert (&info);
10700 
10701 $$  _txError (info.__file_, info.__line_, NULL, 0, "\a"
10702               "Оказалось неверно, что %s (%s). Не надо так.\n\n"
10703               "С помощью std::__libcpp_debug_function вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.", info.__pred_, info.__msg_);
10704     }
10705 
10706 #endif
10707 
10708 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10709 
10710 #pragma runtime_checks ("", off)
10711 
10712 int _txOnRTCFailure (int type, const char* file, int line, const char* module, const char* format, ...)
10713     {
10714     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: %s (%d, %s, %d, %s, %s) called\n", _TX_VERSION, __func__, type, file, line, module, format);
10715 
10716 $5  static long running = 0;
10717 $   while (InterlockedExchange (&running, 1)) Sleep (0);
10718 
10719 $   assert (format);
10720 
10721     // Disable all RTC failures
10722 
10723 $   int nErrors = _RTC_NumErrors();
10724 $   int* errors = NULL;
10725 $   try { errors = (int*) _alloca (nErrors * sizeof (*errors)); } catch (...) {;}
10726 
10727 $   int err = 0;
10728 $   for (int i = 0; i < nErrors; i++) *(errors? &errors[i] : &err) = _RTC_SetErrorType ((_RTC_ErrorNumber) i, _RTC_ERRTYPE_IGNORE);
10729 
10730 $   char text [_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
10731 
10732 $   va_list arg; va_start (arg, format);
10733 $   _tx_vsnprintf_s (text, sizeof (text) - 1, format, arg);                  // Get message from the vararg list
10734 $   auto error = (_RTC_ErrorNumber) va_arg (arg, int /*_RTC_ErrorNumber*/);  // Get the RTC error number
10735 $   va_end (arg);
10736 
10737 $   const char* sType = "type";
10738 
10739 $   switch (type)
10740        {
10741        case _CRT_ERROR:  $ sType = "ошибка";            break;
10742        case _CRT_ASSERT: $ sType = "логическая ошибка"; break;
10743        case _CRT_WARN:   $ sType = "возможная ошибка";  break;
10744        default:          $                              break;
10745        }
10746 
10747 $   const char* sError = _RTC_GetErrDesc (error);
10748 
10749 $$  _txError (file, line, NULL, 0, "\a"
10750               "Сбой проверки выполнения машинного кода: %s %d (%s): %s в модуле %s.", sType, error, sError, text, module);
10751 
10752     // The code below will be never executed until the error above will stay fatal:
10753 
10754     // Restore the RTC error types
10755 
10756     #if defined (_MSC_VER)
10757     #pragma warning (disable: 6385)  // Reading invalid data from 'errors': the readable size is 'n' bytes, but 'm' bytes may be read.
10758     #endif
10759 
10760 $   for (int i = 0; i < nErrors; i++) _RTC_SetErrorType ((_RTC_ErrorNumber) i, (errors? errors[i] : _CRT_ERROR));
10761 
10762     #if defined (_MSC_VER)
10763     #pragma warning (default: 6385)  // Reading invalid data from 'errors': the readable size is 'n' bytes, but 'm' bytes may be read.
10764     #endif
10765 
10766 $   InterlockedExchange (&running, 0);
10767 $   return 1;
10768     }
10769 
10770 #pragma runtime_checks ("", restore)
10771 
10772 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10773 
10774 int _txOnAllocHook (int type, void* data, size_t size, int use, long request, const unsigned char* file, int line)
10775     {
10776     #if (_TX_ALLOW_TRACE +0 >= 4)
10777 
10778     static _tx_thread int recursive = 0;
10779     if (recursive) return true;
10780     recursive++;
10781 
10782     #if (_TX_ALLOW_TRACE +0 <= 10)
10783     if (!size) return true;
10784     #endif
10785 
10786     #define GET_DESCR_(str, type)  case (type): { str = #type; break; }
10787 
10788     const char* sType = "Unknown type";
10789     const char* sUse  = "Unknown use";
10790 
10791     switch (_BLOCK_TYPE (type))
10792         {
10793         GET_DESCR_ (sType, _HOOK_ALLOC);
10794         GET_DESCR_ (sType, _HOOK_REALLOC);
10795         GET_DESCR_ (sType, _HOOK_FREE);
10796         default:   break;
10797         }
10798 
10799     switch (use)
10800         {
10801         GET_DESCR_ (sUse,  _NORMAL_BLOCK);
10802         GET_DESCR_ (sUse,  _CRT_BLOCK);
10803         GET_DESCR_ (sUse,  _CLIENT_BLOCK);
10804         GET_DESCR_ (sUse,  _FREE_BLOCK);
