10805         GET_DESCR_ (sUse,  _IGNORE_BLOCK);
10806         default:   break;
10807         }
10808 
10809     #undef  GET_DESCR_
10810 
10811     _txTrace ((const char*) file, line, NULL, "%*s"
10812               "_txOnAllocHook (type = 0x%02X (%-*s), subtype =0x%X, data = 0x%p, size = 0x%p, use = 0x%02X (%-*s), request = %ld)",
10813               2 * _txLoc::Cur.inTX, "",
10814               type, 13, sType, _BLOCK_SUBTYPE (type), data, (void*) size, use, 13, sUse, request);
10815 
10816     recursive--;
10817 
10818     #else
10819 
10820     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (type);
10821     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (data);
10822     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (size);
10823     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (use);
10824     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (request);
10825     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (file);
10826     UNREFERENCED_PARAMETER (line);
10827 
10828     #endif
10829 
10830     return true;
10831     }
10832 
10833 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10834 
10835 #endif // TX_COMPILED
10836 
10837 #endif
10838 
10839 //}
10840 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10841 
10842 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10843 //{          SEH staff
10844 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10845 
10846 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
10847 
10848 long WINAPI _txVectoredExceptionHandler (EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc)
10849     {
10850     int inTX = _txLoc::Cur.inTX++;
10851 
10852     long ret = _txOnExceptionSEH (exc, "_txVectoredExceptionHandler");
10853 
10854     _txLoc::Cur.inTX = inTX;
10855     return ret;
10856     }
10857 
10858 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10859 
10860 long WINAPI _txUnhandledExceptionFilter (EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc)
10861     {
10862     int inTX = _txLoc::Cur.inTX++;
10863 
10864     long ret = _txOnExceptionSEH (exc, "_txUnhandledExceptionFilter");
10865 
10866     if (_txPrevUEFilter)
10867         {
10868         if (_txSetJmp())
10869             {
10870             int inTX2 = _txLoc::Cur.inTX++;
10871 
10872             ret = _txPrevUEFilter (exc);
10873 
10874             _txLoc::Cur.inTX = inTX2;
10875             }
10876         else
10877             {
10878 $6          _txClearJmp();
10879 
10880             _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\t\a" "%s"
10881                             "С помощью функции _set_se_translator() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.\n\n"
10882                             "Дополнительно: Сбой вызова стандартного обработчика неперехваченнных исключений SEH." + !*_txDumpSE,
10883                             _txDumpSE + 1);
10884             }
10885         }
10886 
10887     _txLoc::Cur.inTX = inTX;
10888     return ret;
10889     }
10890 
10891 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10892 
10893 LPTOP_LEVEL_EXCEPTION_FILTER WINAPI _txOnSetUnhandledExceptionFilter (LPTOP_LEVEL_EXCEPTION_FILTER filter)
10894     {
10895 $6  _txPrevUEFilter = filter;
10896 
10897     return (LPTOP_LEVEL_EXCEPTION_FILTER) _txUnhandledExceptionFilter;
10898     }
10899 
10900 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10901 
10902 long _txOnExceptionSEH (EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc, const char func[])
10903     {
10904     assert (exc); if (!exc) {$ return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_SEARCH; }
10905 
10906     assert (exc->ExceptionRecord);
10907 
10908     assert (func);
10909     assert (func[3] == 'V' || func[3] == 'U');
10910 
10911     bool  unhExc = (func[3] == 'U');
10912     DWORD code   = (exc && exc->ExceptionRecord)? exc->ExceptionRecord->ExceptionCode    : 0;
10913     void* addr   = (exc && exc->ExceptionRecord)? exc->ExceptionRecord->ExceptionAddress : NULL;
10914 
10915     if (code == DBG_PRINTEXCEPTION_C                  ||
10916         code == DBG_PRINTEXCEPTION_WIDE_C             ||
10917         code == DBG_THREAD_NAME                       ||
10918        (code == RPC_S_SERVER_UNAVAILABLE  && !unhExc) ||
10919        (code == RPC_S_CALL_CANCELLED      && !unhExc) ||
10920        (code == EXCEPTION_BREAKPOINT && IsDebuggerPresent()))
10921         return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_SEARCH;
10922 
10923     _txSENumber++;
10924     if (HIBYTE (HIWORD (code)) == 0xC0) _txSEFatalNumber++;
10925 
10926     OutputDebugString ("\n");
10927     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - WARNING: #%ld: %s (code 0x%08lX, addr 0x%p) called\n",
10928                          _TX_VERSION, _txSENumber, func, (unsigned long) code, addr);
10929 
10930 $6  if (*(unsigned long long*) _txDumpExceptionObjJmp)
10931         {
10932 $       longjmp (_txDumpExceptionObjJmp, 1);
10933         }
10934 
10935     tx_fpreset();
10936 
10937     #if defined (_MSC_VER)
10938     if (code == EXCEPTION_STACK_OVERFLOW) {$ _resetstkoflw(); }
10939     #endif
10940 
10941 $   bool primaryException = !(func && exc) || !((unhExc && *_txDumpSE) || _TX_MSC__CXX_DETECT_RETHROW (exc->ExceptionRecord));
10942 
10943 $   if (primaryException && exc)
10944         {
10945 $       unsigned err = GetLastError();
10946 
10947 $       const char* stackTrace = _txCaptureStackBackTrace (0, true, exc->ContextRecord, exc);
10948 
10949 $       _txDumpExceptionSEH (_txDumpSE,  (intptr_t) sizeof (_txDumpSE)  - 1, exc->ExceptionRecord, func);
10950 $       _tx_snprintf_s      (_txTraceSE, (intptr_t) sizeof (_txTraceSE) - 1, "%s", stackTrace);
10951 
10952 $       static _tx_thread DWORD prevCode = 0;
10953 $       static _tx_thread void* prevAddr = NULL;
10954 
10955 $       if (code != prevCode && addr != prevAddr &&
10956             !strstr (_txDumpSE, "Объект исключения C++:"))
10957             {
10958 $           SetLastError (err);
10959 $           _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\v\b\t" "%s", _txDumpSE + 1);
10960 
10961 $           prevCode = code;
10962 $           prevAddr = addr;
10963             }
10964 
10965 $       SetLastError (err);
10966         }
10967 
10968 $   if (_txDumpSE[0]     == '\a'                   ||
10969         _txSENumber      >= _TX_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0 ||
10970         _txSEFatalNumber >= _TX_FATAL_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0)
10971         {
10972 $       _TX_UNEXPECTED ("\a\t" "%s"
10973                         "С помощью функции _set_se_translator() вы можете сами обработать эту ошибку.",
10974                         _txDumpSE + 1);
10975         }
10976 
10977 $   return EXCEPTION_CONTINUE_SEARCH;
10978     }
10979 
10980 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
10981 
10982 intptr_t _txDumpExceptionSEH (char what[], intptr_t size, const EXCEPTION_RECORD* exc, const char func[])
10983     {
10984 $6  assert (what);
10985 $   assert (size >= 0);
10986     assert (exc); if (!exc) {$ return 0; }
10987 $   assert (func);
10988 
10989 $   unsigned         code   = exc->ExceptionCode;
10990 $   void*            addr   = exc->ExceptionAddress;
10991 $   unsigned         params = exc->NumberParameters;
10992 $   const ULONG_PTR* info   = exc->ExceptionInformation;
10993 $   void*            object = (params >= 2)? (void*) info[1] : NULL;
10994 
10995 $   char* s = what;
10996 
10997     #define PRINT_(...)  s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size-2 - (s-what), ##__VA_ARGS__)
10998 
10999 $   const char* sCode  = NULL;
11000 $   const char* sDescr = NULL;
11001 
11002     #define GET_DESCR_(code, descr)  case ((unsigned long) (code)): {$ sCode = #code; sDescr = descr; break; }
11003 
11004 $   switch (code)
11005         {
11006         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION,         " "  "Нарушение доступа к памяти.")
11007         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_ILLEGAL_INSTRUCTION,      " "  "Недопустимая операция.")
11008         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_PRIV_INSTRUCTION,         " "  "Привилегированная операция.")
11009         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_ARRAY_BOUNDS_EXCEEDED,    "\a" "Выход за границы массива. Ставьте ассерты!")
11010         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_BREAKPOINT,               "\a" "Достигнута точка останова. Удачи в отладке!")
11011         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_DATATYPE_MISALIGNMENT,    "\a" "Нарушение выравнивания данных.")
11012         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_INVALID_DISPOSITION,      "\a" "Обработчик исключения возвратил неверное значение.")
11013         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_IN_PAGE_ERROR,            "\a" "Невозможно загрузить нужную страницу памяти.")
11014         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_NONCONTINUABLE_EXCEPTION, "\a" "Продолжение выполнения невозможно.")
11015         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_SINGLE_STEP,              "\a" "Выполнена инструкция машинного кода. Одна штука.")
11016         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_STACK_OVERFLOW,           "\a" "Ю-ху! Переполнение стека!")
11017         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_GUARD_PAGE,               "\a" "Попытка доступа к защищенной странице памяти.")
11018         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_INVALID_HANDLE,           "\a" "Неверный или уже закрытый дескриптор.")
11019         GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_POSSIBLE_DEADLOCK,           "\a" "Возможно, взаимная блокировка ресурсов.")
11020 
11021         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_STACK_CHECK,          "\a" "Ошибка стека при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11022         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_DENORMAL_OPERAND,     " "  "Денормализация числа с плавающей точкой.")
11023         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_DIVIDE_BY_ZERO,       " "  "Деление на ноль при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11024         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_INEXACT_RESULT,       " "  "Неточный результат при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11025         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_INVALID_OPERATION,    " "  "Недопустимая операция с плавающей точкой.")
11026         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_OVERFLOW,             " "  "Переполнение при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11027         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_FLT_UNDERFLOW,            " "  "Потеря значимости при операции с плавающей точкой.")
11028         GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_FLOAT_MULTIPLE_FAULTS,       " "  "Множественные ошибки с плавающей точкой.")
11029 
11030         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_INT_DIVIDE_BY_ZERO,       "\a" "Целочисленное деление на ноль.")
11031         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_INT_OVERFLOW,             "\a" "Переполнение при целочисленной операции.")
11032 
11033         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CLR_FAILURE,              "\a" "Сбой среды исполнения (CLR).")
11034         GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_STACK_BUFFER_OVERRUN,        "\a" "Переполнение стекового буфера!")
11035         GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_ASSERTION_FAILURE,           "\a" "Сработал assert. На этот раз из ядра.")
11036         GET_DESCR_ (STATUS_WX86_BREAKPOINT,             "\a" "Точка останова подсистемы эмуляции x86.")
11037         GET_DESCR_ (RPC_S_UNKNOWN_IF,                   "\a" "Неизвестный интерфейс удаленного вызова процедур (RPC).")
11038         GET_DESCR_ (RPC_S_SERVER_UNAVAILABLE,           "\a" "Сервер удаленного вызова процедур (RPC) недоступен.")
11039         GET_DESCR_ (DBG_TERMINATE_THREAD,               "\a" "Отладчик завершил поток сознания.")
11040         GET_DESCR_ (DBG_TERMINATE_PROCESS,              "\a" "Отладчик завершил процесс.")
11041         GET_DESCR_ (DBG_CONTROL_C,                      "\a" "Отладчик получил сигнал прерывания Control+C.")
11042         GET_DESCR_ (DBG_CONTROL_BREAK,                  "\a" "Отладчик получил сигнал прерывания Control+Break.")
11043         GET_DESCR_ (DBG_THREAD_NAME,                    " "  "Отладчик получил указание дать потоку имя.")
11044         GET_DESCR_ (DBG_PRINTEXCEPTION_C,               " "  "Отладчик вывел исключение по CTRL+C (OutputDebugStringA).")
11045         GET_DESCR_ (DBG_PRINTEXCEPTION_WIDE_C,          " "  "Отладчик вывел исключение по CTRL+C (OutputDebugStringW).")
11046 
11047         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC,                  " "  "Исключение С++, вызванное оператором throw.")
11048         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC,                  " "  "Исключение С++, вызванное оператором throw.")
11049         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_UNWIND,           " "  "Исключение С++, вызванное во время раскрутки стека (rethrow?).")
11050         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_FORCED,           " "  "Исключение С++, вызванное нарушением магии.")
11051         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_BORLAND_BUILDER,      "\a" "Это скомпилилось под Билдер? O_O")
11052         GET_DESCR_ (EXCEPTION_CPP_BORLAND_DELPHI,       "\a" "Это же С++. Как это вышло?")
11053 
11054         default: $ break;
11055         }
11056 
11057     #undef GET_DESCR_
11058 
11059 $   if (sDescr)
11060         {
11061 $       PRINT_ ("%s\n\n" "#%ld: Исключение %s", sDescr, _txSENumber, sCode);
11062         }
11063     else
11064         {
11065 $       PRINT_ ("\a#%ld: ", _txSENumber);
11066 $       s += FormatMessage (FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_HMODULE | FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS,
11067                             GetModuleHandle ("NTDLL.DLL"), code, MAKELANGID (LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT),
11068                             s, (DWORD) (size - (s-what)), NULL) - 2;
11069 $       PRINT_ ("\r\r");
11070         }
11071 
11072 $   PRINT_ (" (0x%X) при выполнении кода по адресу", code);
11073 $   PRINT_ ((addr? " 0x%p" : " NULL"), addr);
11074 
11075 $   Win32::SYMBOL_INFO*     sym  = NULL;
11076 $   Win32::IMAGEHLP_LINE64* line = NULL;
11077 
11078     if (addr) {$ _txSymGetFromAddr (addr, &sym, &line); }
11079 
11080 $   if (sym  &&                   *sym->Name)      PRINT_ (" в функции %s()", sym->Name);
11081 $   if (line && line->FileName && *line->FileName) PRINT_ (" в файле %s на строке %u", line->FileName, (unsigned) line->LineNumber);
11082 
11083 $   if (code == EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION ||
11084         code == EXCEPTION_IN_PAGE_ERROR)
11085         {
11086 $       PRINT_ (". Попытка ");
11087 
11088 $       unsigned long op = 0xBADC0DE;
11089 $       const char*  sOp = "(действие не указано)";
11090 
11091 $       if (params >= 1)
11092             {
11093 $           switch (op = (unsigned long) info[0])
11094                 {
11095                 case 0:  $ sOp = "прочесть данные";          break;
11096                 case 1:  $ sOp = "записать данные";          break;
11097                 case 8:  $ sOp = "исполнить код";            break;
11098                 default: $ sOp = "совершить операцию 0x%lX"; break;
11099                 }
11100             }
11101 
11102 $       PRINT_ (sOp, op);
11103 
11104 $       if (params >= 2) {$ PRINT_ ((object? " по адресу 0x%p" : " по адресу NULL"), object); }
11105         else             {$ PRINT_ (" (адрес не указан)"); }
11106 
11107 $       if (code == EXCEPTION_IN_PAGE_ERROR)
11108             {
11109 $           PRINT_ (", ошибка ввода-вывода:");
11110 
11111 $           if (params >= 3)
11112                 {
11113 $               unsigned long ntstatus = (unsigned long) info[2];
11114 
11115 $               PRINT_ (" 0x%lX (", ntstatus);
11116 
11117 $               s += FormatMessage (FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_HMODULE | FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS,
11118                                     GetModuleHandle ("NTDLL.DLL"), ntstatus, MAKELANGID (LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT),
11119                                     s, (DWORD) (size - (s-what)), NULL) - 2;
11120 $               PRINT_ (")");
11121                 }
11122             else
11123                 {$ PRINT_ (" (не указана)"); }
11124             }
11125         }
11126 
11127 $   HMODULE module = NULL;
11128 $   _TX_CALL (Win32::GetModuleHandleEx, (GET_MODULE_HANDLE_EX_FLAG_FROM_ADDRESS, (const char*) addr, &module));
11129 
11130 $   if (module)
11131         {
11132 $       static char sModule [MAX_PATH] = "";
11133 $       int ok = GetModuleFileName (module, sModule, sizeof (sModule));
11134 
11135 $       char* ext = (ok? strrchr (sModule, '.') : NULL);
11136 $       if (ext) _strlwr_s (ext, sizeof (sModule) - 1 - (ext - sModule));
11137 
11138         if (ok) {$ PRINT_ (" в модуле %s",  sModule); }
11139         else    {$ PRINT_ (" в модуле 0x%p", module); }
11140         }
11141 
11142 $   PRINT_ (".");
11143 
11144 $   if (_txSENumber >= _TX_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0)
11145         {$ PRINT_ (" Дополнительно, превышен лимит исключений _TX_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT (%d).",        _TX_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0); }
11146 
11147 $   if (_txSEFatalNumber >= _TX_FATAL_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0)
11148         {$ PRINT_ (" Также превышен лимит фатальных исключений _TX_FATAL_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT (%d).", _TX_FATAL_EXCEPTIONS_LIMIT+0); }
11149 
11150 $   PRINT_ (" Спасибо %s(), что сообщил. Люблю его <3", func);
11151 
11152 $   if (exc->ExceptionFlags & EXCEPTION_NONCONTINUABLE)
11153         {$ PRINT_ ("\n\n" "Ой, всё (EXCEPTION_NONCONTINUABLE)."); }
11154 
11155 $   if (exc->ExceptionRecord)
11156         {
11157 $       PRINT_ ("\n\n" "Причина:" "\n\n");
11158 $       s += _txDumpExceptionSEH (s, size - (s-what), exc->ExceptionRecord, func);
11159         }
11160 
11161 $   if (code == EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC        ||
11162         code == EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_UNWIND ||
11163         code == EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_FORCED ||
11164         code == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC)
11165         {
11166 $       s += _txDumpExceptionCPP (s,    size - (s-what), code, params, info);
11167         }
11168 
11169     #undef PRINT_
11170 
11171 $   while (s > what && s[-1] == '\n') s--;
11172 $   if (s > what) s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size - (s-what), "\n\n");
11173 
11174 $   return s - what;
11175     }
11176 
11177 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11178 
11179 intptr_t _txDumpExceptionCPP (char what[], intptr_t size,
11180                               unsigned code /*= 0*/, unsigned params /*= 0*/, const ULONG_PTR info[] /*= NULL*/)
11181     {
11182 $6  assert (what);
11183 $   assert (size >= 0);
11184 
11185 $   char* s = what;
11186 
11187 $   switch (code)
11188         {
11189         #if defined (_GCC_VER)
11190 
11191         case EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC:
11192         case EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_UNWIND:
11193         case EXCEPTION_CPP_GCC_FORCED:
11194             {
11195             // See: [1] http://llvm.org/svn/llvm-project/libcxxabi/trunk/src/cxa_exception.cpp
11196             //      [2] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libgcc/unwind-seh.c, lines 51-55 and below
11197             //      [3] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc++-v3/libsupc++/eh_throw.cc, __cxa_throw, line 59 and below
11198             //      [4] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc++-v3/libsupc++/unwind-cxx.h, __cxa_exception, line 58 and below
11199             //      and figure above near ABI::__cxa_exception definition in this file
11200 
11201 $           const std::type_info* type   = NULL;
11202 $           void*                 object = NULL;
11203 
11204 $           if (params >= 1)
11205                 {
11206 $               _Unwind_Exception*    unwind_exception = (_Unwind_Exception*) info[0];
11207 $               ABI::__cxa_exception* cxa_exception    = (ABI::__cxa_exception*) (unwind_exception + 1) - 1;
11208 
11209 $               type   = cxa_exception->exceptionType;
11210 $               object = cxa_exception + 1;
11211                 }
11212 
11213 $           s += _txDumpExceptionObj (s, size - (s-what), object, 0, type);
11214             }
11215 $           break;
11216 
11217         case 0:  // Not called within SEH chain
11218             {
11219             // From: [1] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc++-v3/libsupc++/eh_type.cc
11220             //       [2] http://github.com/gcc-mirror/gcc/blob/master/libstdc++-v3/libsupc++/vterminate.cc
11221 
11222             using namespace abi;
11223 
11224 $           ABI::__cxa_exception* cxa_exception = __cxa_get_globals() -> caughtExceptions;
11225 
11226 $           if (cxa_exception && (cxa_exception->unwindHeader.exception_class & 1))  // Dependent exception, case B, see pic above
11227                 {
11228 $               cxa_exception = (((ABI::__cxa_exception*) (&cxa_exception->unwindHeader + 1) - 1) -> primaryException) - 1;
11229                 }
11230 
11231 $           if (cxa_exception)
11232                 {
11233 $               verify (cxa_exception->exceptionType == abi::__cxa_current_exception_type());
11234 
11235 $               s += _txDumpExceptionObj (s, size, cxa_exception + 1, 0, cxa_exception->exceptionType);
11236                 }
11237             }
11238 $           break;
11239 
11240         #elif defined (_MSC_VER)
11241 
11242         case EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC:
11243             {
11244             // See [1] http://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20100730-00/?p=13273
11245             //     [2] http://www.openrce.org/articles/full_view/21
11246             //     [3] http://www.openrce.org/articles/full_view/23
11247             //     [4] http://yurichev.com/mirrors/RE/Recon-2012-Skochinsky-Compiler-Internals.pdf
11248 
11249 $           const std::type_info* type   = NULL;
11250 $           void*                 object = (params >= 2)? (void*) info[1] : NULL;
11251 $           size_t                szObj  = 0;
11252 
11253 $           if (params >= 3 &&
11254                (info[0] == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC_EH_MAGIC_NUMBER1 ||
11255                 info[0] == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC_EH_MAGIC_NUMBER2 ||
11256                 info[0] == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC_EH_MAGIC_NUMBER3 ||
11257                 info[0] == EXCEPTION_CPP_MSC_EH_PURE_MAGIC_NUMBER1))
11258                 {
11259 $               auto throwInfo = (const Win32::ThrowInfo*) info[2];
11260 
11261 $               if (throwInfo && throwInfo->pCatchableTypeArray)
11262                     {
11263 $                   HMODULE module = (params >= 4)? (HMODULE) info[3] : NULL;
11264 
11265                     #define RVA_(type, addr)  ( (type) ((uintptr_t) module + (uintptr_t) (addr)) )
11266 
11267 $                   const Win32::CatchableTypeArray* cArray = RVA_(const Win32::CatchableTypeArray*, throwInfo->pCatchableTypeArray);
11268 $                   const Win32::CatchableType*      cType  = RVA_(const Win32::CatchableType*,      cArray->arrayOfCatchableTypes[0]);
11269 
11270 $                   type  = RVA_(const std::type_info*, cType->pType);
11271 $                   szObj = cType->sizeOrOffset;
11272 
11273                     #undef  RVA_
11274                     }
11275                 }
11276 
11277 $           s += _txDumpExceptionObj (s, size - (s-what), object, szObj, type);
11278             }
11279             break;
11280 
11281         case 0:  // Not called within SEH chain
11282 
11283             // signal() handlers or unexpected()/terminate() are called after Vectored Exception in MSC:
11284             //
11285             // terminate() is called by __scrt_unhandled_exception_filter() in case of MSC exception.
11286             // See C:\Bin\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\crt\src\vcruntime\utility_desktop.cpp
11287             //
11288             // signal() handlers are called by _seh_filter_exe(), which is called by _mainCRTStartup() in case of exception.
11289             // See C:\Bin\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\crt\src\vcruntime\mcrtexe.cpp
11290             // and C:\Bin\Windows Kits\10\Source\10.0.10240.0\ucrt\misc\exception_filter.cpp
11291             // and http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff730818.aspx.
11292             //
11293             // So _txDumpSE information should have been recorded during previous call. Now do nothing.
11294 
11295 $           break;
11296 
11297         #endif
11298 
11299         default:
11300 $           txOutputDebugPrintf ("ERROR: Wrong call to %s: Unknown exception code 0x%08X\n", __TX_FUNCTION__, code);
11301 $           break;
11302         }
11303 
11304 $   while (s > what && s[-1] == '\n') s--;
11305 $   if (s > what) s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size - (s - what), "\n\n");
11306 
11307 $   return (s - what);
11308     }
11309 
11310 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11311 
11312 intptr_t _txDumpExceptionObj (char what[], intptr_t size, void* object, size_t sizeObj, const std::type_info* type)
11313     {
11314 $6  assert (what);
11315 $   assert (size > 0);
11316 
11317 $   static char*  s     = NULL; s     = what;
11318 $   static size_t szObj = 0;    szObj = sizeObj;
11319 
11320     #define PRINT_(...)  s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size - (s - what), ##__VA_ARGS__)
11321 
11322 $   PRINT_ ("\n\n" "Объект исключения C++:");
11323 
11324 $   const char* mangledName = (type)? type->name() : NULL;
11325 
11326 $   char* typeName = NULL;
11327 $   int err = 1;
11328 
11329     #if defined (_GCC_VER)
11330 $   typeName = ::abi::__cxa_demangle (mangledName, 0, 0, &err);
11331     #endif
11332 
11333 $   const char* name = (!err && typeName)? typeName : mangledName;
11334 
11335 $   if (name &&
11336        (strcmp (name, "class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> >")           == 0 ||
11337         strcmp (name, "std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >")                   == 0))
11338         {$ name = "std::string"; }
11339 
11340 $   if (name &&
11341        (strcmp (name, "class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > *")         == 0 ||
11342         strcmp (name, "class std::basic_string<char,struct std::char_traits<char>,class std::allocator<char> > * __ptr64") == 0 ||
11343         strcmp (name, "std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >*")                  == 0))
11344         {$ name = "std::string*"; }
11345 
11346     if (name) {$ PRINT_ (" %s", name); }
11347 
11348     #if defined (_GCC_VER)
11349 $   free (typeName);
11350     #endif
11351 
11352 $   err = 0;
11353 $   if (mangledName)
11354         {
11355         if (_txSetJmp())
11356             {
11357             #define PRINT_VAL_(fmt, typ, ...)                                                                          \
11358                 else if (*type == typeid (      typ       )) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (* (typ* ) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11359                 else if (*type == typeid (const typ       )) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (* (typ* ) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11360                 else if (*type == typeid (      typ*      )) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (**(typ**) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11361                 else if (*type == typeid (const typ*      )) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (**(typ**) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11362                 else if (*type == typeid (      typ* const)) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (**(typ**) object) __VA_ARGS__); } \
11363                 else if (*type == typeid (const typ* const)) {$ PRINT_ (" = " #fmt, (**(typ**) object) __VA_ARGS__); }
11364 
11365             if (false) ;
11366             PRINT_VAL_ ("%s", char*)  PRINT_VAL_ ('%c', unsigned char)   PRINT_VAL_ (%s,   bool, ? "true" : "false")
11367             PRINT_VAL_ ( %d,  int)    PRINT_VAL_ ( %u,  unsigned int)    PRINT_VAL_ (%g,   float)
11368             PRINT_VAL_ ( %hd, short)  PRINT_VAL_ ( %hu, unsigned short)  PRINT_VAL_ (%lg,  double)
11369             PRINT_VAL_ ( %ld, long)   PRINT_VAL_ ( %lu, unsigned long)   PRINT_VAL_ ('%c', char)
11370             PRINT_VAL_ ("%s", std::string, .c_str())
11371 
11372             else if (std::exception* e = dynamic_cast <std::exception*> ( (std::exception* ) object))
11373                 {
11374 $               PRINT_ (", what(): \"%s\"", e->what());
11375                 }
11376             else
11377                 {$ err = 1; }
11378             }
11379         else
11380             {$ err = 2; }
11381         }
11382 
11383 $   _txClearJmp();
11384 
11385 $   if (err && object && szObj)
11386         {
11387 $       const unsigned char* buf = (const unsigned char*) object;
11388 
11389 $       if (szObj >= 64) szObj = 64;
11390 
11391 $       PRINT_ (", дамп: [");
11392 $       for (size_t i = 0; i < szObj; i++) PRINT_ ("%c", (isprint (buf[i]) && !iscntrl (buf[i]))? buf[i] : '.' );
11393 
11394 $       PRINT_ ("]");
11395 $       for (size_t i = 0; i < szObj; i++) PRINT_ (" %02X", buf[i]);
11396 
11397 $       err = 0;
11398         }
11399 
11400 $   if (err)
11401         {$ PRINT_ (" = ???"); }
11402 
11403 $   PRINT_ ((object? "%sего адрес 0x%p." : "%sего адрес NULL."), ((typeName || mangledName)? ", " : ""), object);
11404 
11405     #undef PRINT_VAL_
11406     #undef PRINT_
11407 
11408 $   return s - what;
11409     }
11410 
11411 #endif // TX_COMPILED
11412 
11413 //}
11414 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11415 
11416 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11417 //{          Stack trace and debug info access
11418 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11419 
11420 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
11421 
11422 const char* _txCaptureStackBackTrace (int framesToSkip /*= 0*/, bool readSource /*= true*/,
11423                                       CONTEXT* context /*= NULL*/, EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc /*= NULL*/,
11424                                       HANDLE thread /*= GetCurrentThread()*/)
11425     {
11426 $6  const int maxFrames = 62;  // MS says: < 63
11427 $   static char trace [(MAX_PATH + 1024+1) * maxFrames] = "";
11428 
11429     if (framesToSkip == -1) {$ return trace; }
11430 
11431 $   static void* capture [maxFrames] = {};
11432 $   int frames = _txStackWalk (framesToSkip + !context, sizearr (capture), capture, context, thread);
11433 
11434 $   memset (trace, 0, sizeof (trace));
11435 $   char* s = trace;
11436 
11437     #define PRINT_(...)  s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, sizeof (trace) - 1 - 3 - (s-trace), ##__VA_ARGS__)
11438 
11439 $   for (int i = 0, n = 0; i < frames; i++)
11440         {
11441 $       void* addr = capture[i];
11442 
11443 $       Win32::SYMBOL_INFO*     sym    = NULL;
11444 $       Win32::IMAGEHLP_LINE64* line   = NULL;
11445 $       const char*             module = NULL;
11446 $       const char*             source = NULL;
11447 $       bool                    inTX   = false;
11448 
11449         if (addr)                {$ inTX = _txSymGetFromAddr ((char*) addr - 1, &sym, &line, &module);          }
11450         if (readSource && !inTX) {$        _txSymGetFromAddr ((void*) 1,        NULL, NULL,  NULL, &source, 2); }
11451 
11452 $       int nl = 0;
11453 $       while (s > trace && s[-1] == '\n') { s--; nl++; }
11454 
11455         #if !defined (_TX_FULL_STACKTRACE)
11456 
11457 $       if (! ((sym && *sym->Name) || (line && ((line->FileName && *line->FileName) || line->LineNumber))))
11458             {$ continue; }
11459 
11460         #endif
11461 
11462 $       PRINT_ ("%s#%2d 0x%p", ((n)? ((source || nl)? "\n\n" : "\n") : ""), i, addr);
11463 $       n++;
11464 
11465         if (addr ==                    0)          {$ PRINT_ (" [Неверный фрейм]");        break; }
11466         if (addr == (void*)           -1)          {$ PRINT_ (" [Странный фрейм]");        break; }
11467         if (addr == (void*)(uintptr_t) 0xBAADF00D) {$ PRINT_ (" [Мусор от LocalAlloc()]"); break; }
11468 
11469         if (module)                                {$ PRINT_ (" in %s%s",     module, ((sym && *sym->Name)? ": " : "")); }
11470         if (sym  && *sym->Name)                    {$ PRINT_ ("%s()",         sym->Name);                                }
11471         if (line && line->FileName)                {$ PRINT_ (" at %s",       line->FileName);                           }
11472         if (line && line->LineNumber)              {$ PRINT_ (" (%d)",  (int) line->LineNumber);                         }
11473         if (source)                                {$ PRINT_ (":\n\n" "%s\n", source);                                   }
11474 
11475         if (sym && strcmp (sym->Name , "main") == 0) {$ break; }
11476         }
11477 
11478     #if defined (_MSC_VER)
11479     #pragma warning (disable: 28199)  // Using possibly uninitialized memory '*s'
11480     #endif
11481 
11482 $   while (s > trace && s[-1] == '\n') s--;
11483 $   *s = 0;
11484 
11485     #if defined (_MSC_VER)
11486     #pragma warning (default: 28199)  // Using possibly uninitialized memory '*s'
11487     #endif
11488 
11489     #undef PRINT_
11490 
11491 $   s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, sizeof (trace) - 1 - (s-trace), "");
11492 
11493     #if !defined (_TX_NO_MINIDUMP)
11494 $   _txCreateMiniDump (exc);
11495     #endif
11496 
11497 $   return trace;
11498     }
11499 
11500 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11501 
11502 // Stack WALKING if the program is DEAD. Dead, Carl!
11503 
11504 int _txStackWalk (int framesToSkip, size_t szCapture, void* capture[], CONTEXT* context /*= NULL*/,
11505                   HANDLE thread /* = GetCurrentThread()*/)
11506     {
11507 $6  namespace MinGW = Win32::MinGW;
11508 
11509 $   assert (capture);
11510 
11511 $   HANDLE process  = GetCurrentProcess();
11512 $   bool thisThread = (Win32::GetThreadId (thread) == GetCurrentThreadId());
11513 
11514 $   CONTEXT ctx = {};
11515 $   ctx.ContextFlags |= CONTEXT_FULL;
11516 
11517 $   int isWow64 = 0;
11518 $   if (Win32::IsWow64Process) Win32::IsWow64Process (process, &isWow64);
11519     else {$ return -1; }
11520 
11521 $   if (context)
11522         {
11523 $       ctx = *context;
11524         }
11525     else
11526         {
11527 $       if (thisThread)
11528             {
11529 $           _TX_CALLv (Win32::RtlCaptureContext, (&ctx));
11530             }
11531         else
11532             {
11533 $           SuspendThread (thread);
11534 
11535 $           ctx.ContextFlags = CONTEXT_ALL;
11536 $           bool ok = !!GetThreadContext (thread, &ctx);
11537 
11538 $           if (!ok)
11539                 {
11540 $               ResumeThread (thread);
11541 $               return -1;
11542                 }
11543             }
11544         }
11545 
11546 $   Win32::STACKFRAME64 frame = {};
11547 $   frame.AddrPC.Mode = frame.AddrStack.Mode = frame.AddrFrame.Mode = Win32::AddrModeFlat;
11548 
11549 $   int cpu = 0;
11550 
11551     #if defined (_WIN64)
11552 
11553 $   if (isWow64)
11554         {
11555 $       Win32::WOW64_CONTEXT wow64ctx = {};
11556 $       wow64ctx.ContextFlags |= WOW64_CONTEXT_FULL;
11557 
11558 $       if (!_TX_CALL (Win32::Wow64GetThreadContext, (thread, &wow64ctx)))  // This call fails in WINE,
11559             {                                                               // while EXIT_PROCESS_DEBUG_EVENT
11560             if (!thisThread) {$ ResumeThread (thread); }
11561 $           return 0;
11562             }
11563 
11564 $       cpu = IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_I386;
11565 
11566 $       frame.AddrPC   .Offset = wow64ctx.Eip;
11567 $       frame.AddrStack.Offset = wow64ctx.Esp;
11568 $       frame.AddrFrame.Offset = wow64ctx.Ebp;
11569         }
11570     else
11571         {
11572 $       cpu = IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_AMD64;
11573 
11574 $       frame.AddrPC   .Offset = ctx.Rip;
11575 $       frame.AddrStack.Offset = ctx.Rbp;
11576 $       frame.AddrFrame.Offset = ctx.Rsp;
11577         }
11578 
11579     #else
11580 
11581         {
11582 $       cpu = IMAGE_FILE_MACHINE_I386;
11583 
11584 $       frame.AddrPC   .Offset = ctx.Eip;
11585 $       frame.AddrStack.Offset = ctx.Ebp;
11586 $       frame.AddrFrame.Offset = ctx.Esp;
11587         }
11588 
11589     #endif
11590 
11591 $   assert (cpu);
11592 
11593     if (_txSetJmp())
11594         {
11595 $       _txSymGetFromAddr ((void*) 1);
11596         }
11597 $   _txClearJmp();
11598 
11599 $   int  frames = -1;
11600 
11601 $   for (frames = -framesToSkip; frames < (int) szCapture; frames++)
11602         {
11603 $       DWORD64 prev = frame.AddrStack.Offset;
11604 
11605         // Я злой и страшный серый walk. Я в поросятах знаю talk.
11606 
11607         if (!_txSetJmp()) {$ break; }
11608 
11609 #if   defined (_GCC_VER)
11610 
11611         if (!_TX_CALL (MinGW::StackWalk64, (cpu, process, thread, &frame, &ctx, NULL,
11612                                             MinGW::SymFunctionTableAccess64, MinGW::SymGetModuleBase64, NULL))) {$ break; }
11613 #elif defined (_MSC_VER)
11614 
11615 $       if (!_TX_CALL (Win32::StackWalk64, (cpu, process, thread, &frame, &ctx, NULL,
11616                                             Win32::SymFunctionTableAccess64, Win32::SymGetModuleBase64, NULL))) {$ break; }
11617 #else
11618         #error _GCC_VER / _MSC_VER not defined
11619 #endif
11620         if (frames < 0) {$ continue; }
11621 
11622 $       void* addr = (void*) frame.AddrPC.Offset;
11623 
11624         if (frame.AddrFrame.Offset == 0)   {$ addr =          0; }  // Bad frame
11625         if (frame.AddrStack.Offset < prev) {$ addr = (void*) -1; }  // Strange frame
11626 
11627 $       assert (0 <= frames && frames < (int) szCapture);
11628 
11629 $       capture[frames] = addr;
11630         }
11631 
11632 $   _txClearJmp();
11633 
11634     if (!thisThread) {$ ResumeThread (thread); }
11635 
11636 $   return frames;
11637     }
11638 
11639 // Note that Rick and Carl are speaking near the C language block. "C block", Carl. See: http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/carl
11640 
11641 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11642 
11643 bool _txSymGetFromAddr (void* addr, Win32::SYMBOL_INFO** symbol /*= NULL*/,
11644                         Win32::IMAGEHLP_LINE64** line /*= NULL*/, const char** module /*= NULL*/,
11645                         const char** source /*= NULL*/, int context /*= 2*/)
11646     {
11647 $7  static HANDLE process = NULL;
11648 
11649 #if   defined (_GCC_VER)
11650     #define LIB_  Win32::MinGW
11651 
11652 #elif defined (_MSC_VER)
11653     #define LIB_  Win32
11654 
11655 #else
11656     #error _GCC_VER / _MSC_VER not defined
11657 #endif
11658 
11659 $   if (!process && addr)
11660         {
11661 $       process = GetCurrentProcess();
11662 
11663 $       DWORD options = SYMOPT_UNDNAME | SYMOPT_LOAD_LINES | SYMOPT_LOAD_ANYTHING | SYMOPT_INCLUDE_32BIT_MODULES |
11664                         SYMOPT_DEFERRED_LOADS | SYMOPT_FAVOR_COMPRESSED | SYMOPT_FAIL_CRITICAL_ERRORS | SYMOPT_NO_PROMPTS;
11665 
11666 $        _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymSetOptions, (options));
11667 $        _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymInitialize, (process, NULL, true));
11668         }
11669 
11670 $   static DWORD64 mod = 0;
11671 
11672 $   if (module)
11673         {
11674 $       static char sMod [MAX_PATH] = "";
11675 $       memset (sMod, 0, sizeof (sMod));
11676 
11677 $       mod = _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymGetModuleBase64, (process, (uintptr_t) addr));
11678 
11679 $       GetModuleFileName ((HMODULE)(intptr_t) mod, sMod, MAX_PATH);
11680 
11681 $       char* ext = strrchr (sMod, '.');
11682         if (ext) {$ _strlwr_s (ext, sizeof (sMod) - (ext-sMod)); }
11683 
11684 $       *module = sMod;
11685         }
11686 
11687 $   static char buffer [_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
11688 $   static Win32::SYMBOL_INFO* sym = (Win32::SYMBOL_INFO*) buffer;
11689 
11690 $   if (symbol)
11691         {
11692 $       memset (buffer, 0, sizeof (buffer));
11693 
11694 $       sym->MaxNameLen   = sizeof (buffer) - sizeof (Win32::SYMBOL_INFO) - 1;
11695 $       sym->SizeOfStruct = sizeof (Win32::SYMBOL_INFO);
11696 $       unsigned long long ofs = 0;
11697 
11698 $       _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymFromAddr, (process, (uintptr_t) addr, &ofs, sym));
11699 
11700         if (strcmp (sym->Name, "??") == 0) {$ *sym->Name = 0; }
11701 
11702 $       *symbol = sym;
11703         }
11704 
11705 $   static Win32::IMAGEHLP_LINE64 line64 = { sizeof (line) };
11706 
11707 $   if (line)
11708         {
11709 $       memset (&line64, 0, sizeof (line64));
11710 
11711 $       DWORD ofs = 0;
11712 $       _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymGetLineFromAddr64, (process, (uintptr_t) addr, &ofs, &line64));
11713 
11714 $       *line = &line64;
11715         }
11716 
11717 $   if (source)
11718         {
11719 $       static char buf [_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
11720 $       memset (buf, 0, sizeof (buf));
11721 
11722 $       if (line64.FileName && line64.LineNumber)
11723             {
11724 $           _txReadSource (buf, sizeof (buf) - 1, line64.FileName,
11725                           (int) line64.LineNumber - context, (int) line64.LineNumber + context, (int) line64.LineNumber);
11726 
11727 $           *source = buf;
11728             }
11729 
11730         if (!*source || !**source) {$ *source = NULL; }
11731         }
11732 
11733 $   if (!addr && process)
11734         {
11735 $       _TX_CALL (LIB_::SymCleanup, (process));
11736 
11737 $       process = NULL;
11738         }
11739 
11740 $   if (symbol)
11741         {
11742 $       if (strstr  (sym->Name, "::TX::")                                                  ||
11743            (strncmp (sym->Name, "_tx",  3) == 0 && isupper ((unsigned char) sym->Name[3])) ||
11744            (strncmp (sym->Name,  "tx",  2) == 0 && isupper ((unsigned char) sym->Name[2])) ||
11745             strncmp (sym->Name, "_tx_", 4) == 0                                            ||
11746             strncmp (sym->Name,  "tx_", 3) == 0)
11747             {
11748 $           return true;
11749             }
11750 
11751 $       if (!line || !line64.FileName) return false;
11752 
11753 $       intptr_t len = strlen (line64.FileName) - (sizeof (__FILE__) - 1);
11754 
11755 $       return (len >= 0 && _stricmp (line64.FileName + len, __FILE__) == 0) &&
11756                (len == 0 || line64.FileName[len-1] == '/' || line64.FileName[len-1] == '\\');
11757         }
11758 
11759     #undef LIB_
11760 
11761 $   return false;
11762     }
11763 
11764 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11765 
11766 intptr_t _txReadSource (char buf[], intptr_t size, const char file[],
11767                         int linStart /*= 0*/, int linEnd /*= INT_MIN*/, int linMark /*= INT_MIN*/)
11768     {
11769 $7  assert (buf);
11770 
11771     if (!file || !*file) {$ return 0; }
11772 
11773     if (linStart < 1) {$ linStart = 1;       }
11774     if (linEnd == -1) {$ linEnd   = INT_MAX; }
11775 
11776 $   FILE* f = NULL;
11777 $   fopen_s (&f, file, "r");
11778     if (!f) {$ return 0; }
11779 
11780 $   int n = 1;
11781     while (!feof (f))
11782         {
11783         if (n >= linStart) {$ break; }
11784         while (!feof (f) && fgetc (f) != '\n')
11785             ;
11786         n++;
11787         }
11788 
11789 $   char* s = buf;
11790 
11791     #define SZ_  ( size - 3 - (s - buf) )
11792 
11793 $   while (!feof (f) && SZ_ > 0)
11794         {
11795         if (n > linEnd || _txNOP (SZ_) < 0) {$ break; }
11796 
11797         if (linMark != INT_MIN)
11798             {$ s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, SZ_, "%s%5d: ", ((n == linMark)? "=>" : "  "), n); }
11799 
11800 $       int c = 0;
11801 $       while (!feof (f) && SZ_ > 0 && (c = fgetc (f)) != '\n') *s++ = (char) c;
11802         if (c == EOF) {$ s--; }
11803 
11804         if (SZ_ > 0) {$ *s++ = '\n'; }
11805 $       n++;
11806         }
11807 
11808     if (n <= linEnd && SZ_ <= 0)
11809         {$ s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, size - (s - buf), "..."); }
11810 
11811     #undef SZ_
11812 
11813 $   fclose (f);
11814 
11815     if (s > buf && s[-1] == '\n') {$ s--; }
11816 $   *s = 0;
11817 
11818 $   return (s - buf);
11819     }
11820 
11821 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11822 
11823 const char* _txCaptureStackBackTraceTX (int framesToSkip /*= 0*/, bool readSource /*= false*/)
11824     {
11825 $6  const int maxFrames = 62;  // TX says too: < 63
11826 $   static char trace [(MAX_PATH + 1024+1) * maxFrames] = "";
11827 
11828     if (framesToSkip == -1) {$ return trace; }
11829 
11830 $   memset (trace, 0, sizeof (trace));
11831 $   char* s = trace;
11832 
11833     #define SZ_  ( sizeof (trace) - 1 - 3 - (s-trace) )
11834 
11835 $   const _txLoc* loc = &_txLoc::Cur;
11836 
11837     for (int i = 0; loc && i < framesToSkip + 1; i++, loc = loc->prev) { $; }
11838 
11839 $   for (int i = -framesToSkip; loc && i < maxFrames; i++, loc = loc->prev)
11840         {
11841         if (i < 0) {$ continue; }
11842 
11843         if (loc->func || loc->file || loc->line)
11844             {
11845 $           s += _tx_snprintf_s     (s, SZ_, "%s#%2d in %s at %s (%d)", (i? readSource? "\n\n" : "\n" : ""),
11846                                      i, loc->func, loc->file, loc->line);
11847 
11848 $           if (readSource)
11849                 {
11850 $               s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, SZ_, ":\n\n");
11851 $               s += _txReadSource  (s, SZ_, loc->file, loc->line - 2, loc->line + 2, loc->line);
11852                 }
11853             }
11854         }
11855 
11856     #undef SZ_
11857 
11858 $   s += _tx_snprintf_s (s, sizeof (trace) - 1 - (s-trace), "");
11859 
11860 $   return trace;
11861     }
11862 
11863 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11864 
11865 bool _txCreateMiniDump (EXCEPTION_POINTERS* exc /*= NULL*/)
11866     {
11867 $6  static char dumpName[MAX_PATH] = "";
11868     if (!*dumpName) {$ _tx_snprintf_s (dumpName, sizeof (dumpName) - 1, "%s.dmp", _txLogName); }
11869 
11870 $   HANDLE file = CreateFile (dumpName, GENERIC_WRITE, 0, NULL, CREATE_ALWAYS, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL);
11871 
11872     if (!file || file == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {$ return false; }
11873 
11874 $   Win32::MINIDUMP_EXCEPTION_INFORMATION excInfo = { GetCurrentThreadId(), exc, false };
11875 $   Win32::MINIDUMP_TYPE type = (Win32::MINIDUMP_TYPE) (Win32::MiniDumpWithIndirectlyReferencedMemory | Win32::MiniDumpScanMemory);
11876 
11877 $   bool ok = _TX_CALL (Win32::MiniDumpWriteDump, (GetCurrentProcess(), GetCurrentProcessId(), file, type,
11878                                                    ((exc)? &excInfo : NULL), NULL, NULL));
11879 $   CloseHandle (file);
11880 
11881     if (ok) {$ return true;  }
11882     else    {$ return false; }
11883     }
11884 
11885 #endif // TX_COMPILED
11886 
11887 //}
11888 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11889 
11890 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11891 //{          Errors reporting
11892 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
11893 
11894 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
11895 
11896 const char* _txProcessError (const char file[], int line, const char func[], unsigned color, const char msg[], va_list args)
11897     {
11898     _txErrors++;
11899 
11900     DWORD           winErr   = GetLastError();
11901 
11902     int             crtErr   = errno;
11903 
11904     #if !defined (__CYGWIN__)
11905     unsigned long   dosErr   = _doserrno;
11906     #else
11907     unsigned long   dosErr   = 0;
11908     #endif
11909 
11910     unsigned        oglErr   = _TX_CALL (Win32::wglGetCurrentDC, ())? _TX_CALL (Win32::glGetError, ()) : _txOGLError;
11911 
11912     unsigned        threadId = GetCurrentThreadId();
11913 
11914     enum { isFatal = 0x01, isWarning = 0x02, noMsgBox = 0x04, fmtOnly = 0x08, traceSE = 0x10 };
11915     unsigned options = 0;
11916 
11917     for (; msg && *msg; msg++)
11918         {
11919         if      (*msg == '\a') options |= isFatal;
11920         else if (*msg == '\v') options |= isWarning;
11921         else if (*msg == '\b') options |= noMsgBox;
11922         else if (*msg == '\f') options |= fmtOnly;
11923         else if (*msg == '\t') options |= traceSE;
11924         else break;
11925         }
11926 
11927     const char* stkTrace = NULL;
11928     const char*  txTrace = NULL; (void) txTrace;
11929 
11930     if (!(options & fmtOnly))
11931         {
11932         stkTrace = ((options & traceSE) && *_txTraceSE)? _txTraceSE : _txCaptureStackBackTrace   (2, true);
11933         txTrace  =                                                    _txCaptureStackBackTraceTX (0, true);
11934         }
11935 
11936     static char what[_TX_BIGBUFSIZE*10] = "";
11937     static char str [_TX_BIGBUFSIZE]    = "";
11938     char *s = what;
11939 
11940     #define     PRINT_(...)  s += _tx_snprintf_s  (s, sizeof (what) - 1 - (s - what), ##__VA_ARGS__)
11941     #define    VPRINT_(...)  s += _tx_vsnprintf_s (s, sizeof (what) - 1 - (s - what), ##__VA_ARGS__)
11942 
11943                 PRINT_ ("TXLib %s\n\n", ((options & isWarning)? "предупреждает:" :
11944                                          (options & isFatal)?   "соболезнует..." :
11945                                                                 "сообщает:"));
11946                 PRINT_ ("Программа: %s", txGetModuleFileName());
11947     if (file)   PRINT_ (", файл: %s",    file);
11948     if (line)   PRINT_ (", строка: %d",  line);
11949     if (func)   PRINT_ (", функция: %s", func);
11950                 PRINT_ (",\n\n");
11951 
11952     if (msg)    PRINT_ ("%s: ", (file || line || func)? "Сообщение" : "ВНЕЗАПНО"),
11953                VPRINT_ (msg, args);
11954 
11955     while (s > what && s[-1] == '\n') s--;
11956 
11957                 PRINT_ ("\n\n" "#%d: %s, Instance: 0x%p (%d-bit), Flags: %c%c%c%c%c%d, Thread: 0x%X%s",
11958 
11959                         _txErrors, _TX_VERSION, &_txInitialized, (sizeof (void*) == 4)? 32 : 64,
11960 
11961                         "cC"[_txConsole], "mM"[_txMain], "dD"[_txIsDll], "rR"[_txRunning], "eE"[_txExit], _txLoc::Cur.trace,
11962 
11963                         threadId, (threadId == _txMainThreadId)?    " (Main)"   :
11964                                   (threadId == _txCanvas_ThreadId)? " (Canvas)" : "");
11965 
11966     if (winErr) PRINT_ (", GetLastError(): %lu (", (unsigned long) winErr),
11967                 s += FormatMessage (FORMAT_MESSAGE_FROM_SYSTEM | FORMAT_MESSAGE_IGNORE_INSERTS,
11968                                     NULL, winErr, MAKELANGID (LANG_NEUTRAL, SUBLANG_DEFAULT),
11969                                     s, (DWORD) (sizeof (what) - (s-what)), NULL) - 2,
11970                 s -=  (s[-1] == '.')? 1 : 0,
11971                 PRINT_ (")");
11972 
11973     if (crtErr) PRINT_ (", errno: %d (%s)",        crtErr, (strerror_s (str, sizeof (str), crtErr), str));
11974     if (dosErr) PRINT_ (", _doserrno: %lu (%s)",   dosErr, (strerror_s (str, sizeof (str), dosErr), str));
11975     if (oglErr) PRINT_ (", glGetError(): %u (0x%04X, %s)", oglErr, oglErr, _TX_CALL (Win32::gluErrorString, (oglErr)));
11976 
11977     #if (__cplusplus >= 201703L) || (defined (_MSVC_LANG) && _MSVC_LANG >= 201703L)
11978                 PRINT_ (". %s\n", ::std::uncaught_exceptions()? "std::uncaught_exceptions(): true." : "");
11979     #else
11980                 PRINT_ (". %s\n", ::std::uncaught_exception ()? "std::uncaught_exception(): true."  : "");
11981     #endif
11982 
11983     if (_txLoc::Cur.inTX > 0 && file && !(_txLoc::Cur.line == line && _stricmp (_txLoc::Cur.file, file) == 0) &&
11984        (_txLoc::Cur.file || _txLoc::Cur.line || _txLoc::Cur.func))
11985                 PRINT_ ("From: %s (%d) %s.\n", _txLoc::Cur.file, _txLoc::Cur.line, _txLoc::Cur.func);
11986 
11987     txOutputDebugPrintf ("\r" "%s - ERROR: %s\n", _TX_VERSION, what);
11988 
11989     if (options & fmtOnly)
11990         {
11991         SetLastError (winErr);
11992 
11993         errno = crtErr;
11994 
11995         #if !defined (__CYGWIN__)
11996         _doserrno = dosErr;
11997         #endif
11998 
11999         return what;
12000         }
12001 
12002     unsigned restore = txGetConsoleAttr();
12003     txSetConsoleAttr ((options & isFatal)? FOREGROUND_LIGHTMAGENTA : FOREGROUND_LIGHTRED);
12004     if (color) {$ txSetConsoleAttr (color); }
12005 
12006     int oldCodePage = txSetLocale();
12007 
12008     fprintf (stderr,      "\n" "--------------------------------------------------\n"
12009                                "%s\n"
12010                                "--------------------------------------------------\n",
12011                                what);
12012 
12013     if (stkTrace && strstr (stkTrace, ".exe: "))
12014         {$ fprintf (stderr,    "Стек вызовов:\n\n"
12015                                "%s\n\n"
12016                                "--------------------------------------------------\n",
12017                                stkTrace); }
12018 
12019     SetConsoleOutputCP (oldCodePage);
12020     txSetConsoleAttr (restore);
12021 
12022     if (*_txLogName) do
12023         {
12024         FILE* log = NULL; fopen_s (&log, _txLogName, "a");
12025         if (!log) {$ break; }
12026 
12027         fprintf (log,     "\n" "--------------------------------------------------\n"
12028                                "%s\n"
12029                                "--------------------------------------------------\n",
12030                                what);
12031 
12032         fprintf (log,          "Стек вызовов:\n\n"
12033                                "%s\n",
12034                                (*_txTraceSE? _txTraceSE : stkTrace));
12035 
12036         #if defined (_TX_ALLOW_TRACE) || defined (_DEBUG)
12037 
12038         if (_txLoc::Cur.inTX > 0 && txTrace && *txTrace)
12039             {
12040             fprintf (log, "\n" "--------------------------------------------------\n"
12041                                "Стек вызовов TX:\n\n"
12042                                "%s\n",
12043                                txTrace);
12044             }
12045 
12046         #endif
12047 
12048         fprintf (log,     "\n" "--------------------------------------------------\n"
12049                                "%s\n\n"
12050                                "--------------------------------------------------\n",
12051                                _txAppInfo());
12052         fclose (log);
12053         break;
12054         }
12055         while (false);
12056 
12057     int ret = 0;
12058 
12059     if (!(options & noMsgBox))
12060         {
12061         txSleep (_txWindowUpdateInterval);
12062 
12063         PRINT_ ("\n" "Прервать программу?");
12064 
12065         ret = txMessageBox (what, ((options & isWarning)? "Предупреждение"   :
12066                                    (options & isFatal)?   "Фатальная ошибка" :
12067                                                           "Ошибка в программе"), MB_ICONSTOP | MB_SYSTEMMODAL | MB_YESNOCANCEL);
12068         }
12069 
12070     SetLastError (winErr);
12071 
12072     errno = crtErr;
12073 
12074     #if !defined (__CYGWIN__)
12075     _doserrno = dosErr;
12076     #endif
12077 
12078     if (((options & isFatal) && !IsDebuggerPresent()) || ret == IDYES)
12079         {
12080         txUnlock();
12081         _txCleanup();
12082         Win32::TerminateProcess (GetCurrentProcess(), EXIT_FAILURE);
12083         }
12084 
12085     #undef PRINT_
12086 
12087     return what;
12088     }
12089 
12090 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12091 
12092 #if defined (_MSC_VER)
12093 
12094 int _txOnErrorReport (int type, const char* text, int* ret)
12095     {
12096     assert (text);
12097     assert (ret);
12098 
12099     _txErrors++;
12100 
12101     unsigned restore = txGetConsoleAttr();
12102 
12103     switch (type)
12104        {
12105        case _CRT_WARN:   txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTRED);     break;
12106        case _CRT_ERROR:  txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTMAGENTA); break;
12107        case _CRT_ASSERT: txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW);       break;
12108        default:                                                      break;
12109        }
12110 
12111     const char startReport[] = "Detected memory leaks!\n",
12112                  endReport[] = "Object dump complete.\n";
12113 
12114     if (strcmp (text, startReport) == 0)  // Dirty, dirty hack. А что делать?
12115         {
12116         _txOnErrorReport (type, "\n",                                                                              NULL);
12117         _txOnErrorReport (type, _TX_VERSION " - ERROR: ",                                                          NULL);
12118         _txOnErrorReport (type, "Внимание: Обнаружены утечки памяти! (Для поиска используйте _TX_ALLOC_BREAK.)\n", NULL);
12119         _txOnErrorReport (type, "\n",                                                                              NULL);
12120         }
12121 
12122     size_t len = strlen (text);
12123     if (text [len-1] != '\n')               txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s",                text);
12124     else if (strcmp (text, endReport) != 0) txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s" "%s - ERROR: ", text, _TX_VERSION);
12125     else                                    txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s\n",              text);
12126 
12127     DWORD n = 0;
12128     HANDLE err = GetStdHandle (STD_ERROR_HANDLE);
12129     WriteFile (err, text, (DWORD) strlen (text), &n, NULL);
12130 
12131     txSetConsoleAttr (restore);
12132 
12133     if (*_txLogName) do
12134         {
12135         HANDLE log = CreateFile (_txLogName, GENERIC_WRITE, FILE_SHARE_READ, NULL, OPEN_ALWAYS, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, NULL);
12136         if (log == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) break;
12137 
12138         SetFilePointer (log, 0, NULL, FILE_END);
12139         WriteFile (log, text, (DWORD) strlen (text), &n, NULL);
12140 
12141         CloseHandle (log);
12142         break;
12143         }
12144         while (false);
12145 
12146     if (ret) *ret = 0;
12147 
12148     return (type == _CRT_WARN);
12149     }
12150 
12151 #endif
12152 
12153 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12154 
12155 int txMessageBox (const char text[], const char header[], unsigned flags /*= MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OKCANCEL*/)
12156     {
12157 $5  static wchar_t textW   [_TX_BIGBUFSIZE * sizeof (wchar_t)] = L"[NULL text]";
12158 $   static wchar_t headerW [_TX_BUFSIZE    * sizeof (wchar_t)] = L"[NULL header]";
12159 
12160     if (text)   {$ MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, text,   -1, textW,   sizearr (textW))   || memset (textW,   0, sizeof (textW));   }
12161     if (header) {$ MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, header, -1, headerW, sizearr (headerW)) || memset (headerW, 0, sizeof (headerW)); }
12162 
12163 $   HWND wnd = _txCanvas_Window;
12164 $   int  ret = MessageBoxW ((wnd && IsWindowVisible (wnd))? wnd : _TX_CALL (Win32::GetConsoleWindow,()),
12165                             textW, headerW, flags | MB_SETFOREGROUND | MB_TOPMOST | MB_OKCANCEL );
12166 $   if (ret == IDCANCEL)
12167         {
12168 $       SendNotifyMessage (txWindow(), (_txMain? WM_CLOSE : WM_DESTROY), 0, 0);
12169 $       _txWaitFor (!_txCanvas_Window, _TX_TIMEOUT);
12170         }
12171 
12172 $   return ret;
12173     }
12174 
12175 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12176 
12177 bool txGetAsyncKeyState (int key)
12178     {
12179 $1  HWND wnd = GetForegroundWindow();
12180 
12181     return (GetAsyncKeyState (key) & 0x8000) &&
12182            (wnd == txWindow() || wnd == Win32::GetConsoleWindow());
12183     }
12184 
12185 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12186 
12187 bool txNotifyIcon (unsigned flags, const char title[], const char format[], ...)
12188     {
12189 $5  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (format)) return false;
12190 
12191 $   va_list arg; va_start (arg, format);
12192 $   bool ok = true;
12193 
12194     #if defined (_WIN32_IE) && (_WIN32_IE >= 0x0500)
12195 
12196 $   NOTIFYICONDATA nid = { sizeof (nid) };
12197 
12198 $   nid.uFlags      = NIF_ICON | NIF_TIP | NIF_INFO;
12199 $   nid.hWnd        = NULL;
12200 $   nid.uID         = 1;
12201 $   nid.hIcon       = _txCreateTXIcon (16); assert (nid.hIcon);
12202 $   strncpy_s       (nid.szTip,       sizeof (nid.szTip),       "TXLib Information", sizeof (nid.szTip));
12203 $   strncpy_s       (nid.szInfoTitle, sizeof (nid.szInfoTitle), (title? title : "TXLib сообщает"), sizeof (nid.szInfoTitle) - 1);
12204 $   _tx_vsnprintf_s (nid.szInfo, sizeof (nid.szInfo), format, arg);
12205 $   nid.dwInfoFlags = flags;
12206 
12207 $   txOutputDebugPrintf ("\r" _TX_VERSION " - %s: %s (Icon notification)\n", nid.szInfoTitle, nid.szInfo);
12208 
12209 $   ok &= !!Shell_NotifyIcon (NIM_ADD,    (::NOTIFYICONDATA*) &nid);
12210 $   ok &= !!Shell_NotifyIcon (NIM_MODIFY, (::NOTIFYICONDATA*) &nid);
12211 
12212 $   if (nid.hIcon) DestroyIcon (nid.hIcon) asserted;
12213 
12214     #else
12215 
12216 $   char nid_szInfo[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
12217 $   _tx_vsnprintf_s (nid_szInfo, sizeof (nid_szInfo), format, arg);
12218 $   txOutputDebugPrintf ("\r" _TX_VERSION " - %s: %s (Icon notification - NOT displayed)\n", title, nid_szInfo);
12219 $   ok = false;
12220 
12221 $   (void)flags; (void)title;
12222 
12223     #endif
12224 
12225 $   va_end (arg);
12226     return ok;
12227     }
12228 
12229 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12230 
12231 void _txTrace (const char file[], int line, const char func[], const char msg[] /*= NULL*/, ...)
12232     {
12233     unsigned id = GetCurrentThreadId();
12234 
12235     const char marks[2][2][3] = {{"uU", "cC"}, {"mM", "??"}};
12236 
12237     char mark = marks [id == _txMainThreadId] [id == _txCanvas_ThreadId] [(_txLoc::Cur.inTX > 0)];
12238 
12239     char msgStr[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
12240     if (msg)
12241         {
12242         va_list arg; va_start (arg, msg);
12243         _tx_vsnprintf_s (msgStr, sizeof (msgStr) - 1, msg, arg);
12244         va_end (arg);
12245         }
12246 
12247     txOutputDebugPrintf ("%s - 0x%p %c%c%c%c%c%d [%c] - %-*s (%5d)  " "|%*s%s" "%s%s\n",
12248 
12249                          _TX_VERSION, &_txInitialized,
12250 
12251                          "cC"[_txConsole], "mM"[_txMain], "dD"[_txIsDll], "rR"[_txRunning], "eE"[_txExit],
12252                          _txLoc::Cur.trace, mark,
12253 
12254                          (int) sizeof (__FILE__) - 1, (file? file : "(NULL file)"), line,
12255                          2 * (_txLoc::Cur.inTX - 1) * !!func, "", (func? func : ""),
12256 
12257                          ((*msgStr && func)? ": " : ""), msgStr);
12258     }
12259 
12260 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12261 
12262 int txOutputDebugPrintf (const char format[], ...)
12263     {
12264     if (!format) return 0;
12265 
12266     enum { msgbox = 1, print = 2, compr = 4 };
12267     int options = 0;
12268 
12269     for (; format && *format; format++)
12270         {
12271         if      (*format == '\a') options |= msgbox;
12272         else if (*format == '\f') options |= print;
12273         else if (*format == '\r') options |= compr;
12274         else break;
12275         }
12276 
12277     char text[_TX_BIGBUFSIZE] = "";
12278 
12279     va_list arg; va_start (arg, format);
12280     int n = (int) _tx_vsnprintf_s (text, sizeof (text) - 1-1, format, arg);
12281     va_end (arg);
12282 
12283     struct __ { static int trimSpaces (char str[])
12284         {
12285         char *dst = str, *src = str;
12286 
12287         for (char d = ' '; d; src++)
12288             if (isspace ((unsigned char)(*src))) { if (d != ' ') *dst++ = d = ' '; }
12289             else                                                 *dst++ = d = *src;
12290 
12291         return (int) (dst - str - 1);
12292         }};
12293 
12294     if (options & compr)  n = __::trimSpaces (text);
12295 
12296     OutputDebugString (text);
12297 
12298     if (options & print)  fprintf (stderr, "%s", text);
12299 
12300     if (options & msgbox) txMessageBox (text, "Оказывается, что", MB_ICONEXCLAMATION);
12301 
12302     return n;
12303     }
12304 
12305 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12306 
12307 intptr_t _tx_snprintf_s (char stream[], intptr_t size, const char format[], ...)
12308     {
12309     if (!format) return 0;
12310 
12311     va_list arg; va_start (arg, format);
12312     intptr_t ret = _tx_vsnprintf_s (stream, size, format, arg);
12313     va_end (arg);
12314 
12315     return ret;
12316     }
12317 
12318 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12319 
12320 intptr_t _tx_vsnprintf_s (char stream[], intptr_t size, const char format[], va_list arg)
12321     {
12322     if (!stream || !format) return 0;
12323 
12324     #if defined (_TRUNCATE)
12325     intptr_t ret = _vsnprintf_s (stream, size, _TRUNCATE, format, arg);
12326     #else
12327     intptr_t ret = _vsnprintf   (stream, size,            format, arg);
12328     #endif
12329 
12330     if (ret < 0 && size >= 4)
12331         {
12332         const char ellipsis[] = "...";
12333         size_t     szEllipsis = sizeof (ellipsis) - 1;
12334 
12335         strncpy_s (stream + size - szEllipsis, szEllipsis+1, ellipsis, szEllipsis);
12336         }
12337 
12338     return (ret >= 0)? ret : size;
12339     }
12340 
12341 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12342 
12343 #if defined (__CYGWIN__)
12344 
12345 int _getch()
12346     {
12347     termios oldattr = {}; tcgetattr (STDIN_FILENO, &oldattr);
12348 
12349     termios newattr = oldattr;
12350     newattr.c_lflag &= ~(ICANON | ECHO);
12351     tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &newattr);
12352 
12353     int ch = getchar();
12354 
12355     tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &oldattr);
12356 
12357     return ch;
12358     }
12359 
12360 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12361 
12362 int _putch (int ch)
12363     {
12364     termios old = {}; tcgetattr (STDOUT_FILENO, &old);
12365 
12366     termios cur = old;
12367     cur.c_lflag &= ~ICANON;
12368     cur.c_lflag |=  ECHO;
12369     tcsetattr (STDOUT_FILENO, TCSANOW, &cur);
12370 
12371     putchar (ch);
12372 
12373     tcsetattr (STDOUT_FILENO, TCSANOW, &old);
12374 
12375     return ch;
12376     }
12377 
12378 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12379 
12380 int _kbhit()
12381     {
12382     termios old = {}; tcgetattr (STDIN_FILENO, &old);
12383 
12384     termios cur = old;
12385     cur.c_lflag &= ~(ICANON | ECHO);
12386     cur.c_cc[VMIN]  = 1;
12387     cur.c_cc[VTIME] = 0;
12388 
12389     tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSAFLUSH, &cur);
12390 
12391     fd_set  fd = {}; FD_SET (STDIN_FILENO, &fd);
12392     timeval tv = {};
12393 
12394     int res = select (STDIN_FILENO + 1, &fd, NULL, NULL, &tv) && FD_ISSET (STDIN_FILENO, &fd);
12395 
12396     tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSAFLUSH, &old);
12397 
12398     return res;
12399     }
12400 
12401 #endif
12402 
12403 #endif // TX_COMPILED
12404 
12405 //}
12406 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12407 
12408 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12409 //{          Information
12410 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12411 
12412 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
12413 
12414 const char* txGetModuleFileName (bool fileNameOnly /*= true*/)
12415     {
12416     static char name[MAX_PATH] = "";
12417 
12418     if (!*name)
12419         {
12420         if (!GetModuleFileName (NULL, name, sizeof (name) - 1)) *name = 0;
12421 
12422         char* ext = strrchr (name, '.');
12423         if (ext) _strlwr_s (ext, sizeof (name) - 1 - (ext - name));
12424         }
12425 
12426     assert (*name);
12427 
12428     if (fileNameOnly) return name;
12429 
12430     static char fullName[MAX_PATH] = "";
12431     strncpy_s (fullName, sizeof (fullName), name, sizeof (fullName) - 1);
12432 
12433     char* title = strrchr (fullName, '\\'); if (!title) title = fullName;
12434     char* ext   = strrchr (fullName,  '.'); if (!ext)   ext   = fullName + strlen (fullName);
12435 
12436     size_t sz = sizeof (fullName) - (ext - fullName);
12437     strncpy_s (ext, sz-1, " - TXLib", sz);
12438 
12439     return title + 1;
12440     }
12441 
12442 #endif // TX_COMPILED
12443 
12444 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12445 
12446 inline const char* _txAppInfo()
12447     {
12448 $1  time_t timeT     = time (NULL) - clock()/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
12449     char   timeS[32] = "";
12450     ctime_s (timeS, sizeof (timeS), &timeT);
12451 
12452     static char text[_TX_BUFSIZE] = "";
12453     char cwd [MAX_PATH] = "";
12454 
12455     _tx_snprintf_s (text, sizeof (text) - 1,
12456 
12457                     "Developed with:\n\n"
12458                     "The Dumb Artist Library (TX Library)\n"
12459                     _TX_VERSION "\n" _TX_AUTHOR "\n"
12460                     "See license on: http://txlib.ru\n\n"
12461 
12462                     "TXLib file:" "\t" __FILE__ "\n"
12463                     "Compiled:"   "\t" __DATE__ " " __TIME__ ", " __TX_COMPILER__ ", %s, %d-bit, " _TX_BUILDMODE "\n"
12464                     "Started:"    "\t" "%.6s %.4s %.8s\n\n"
12465 
12466                     "Run file:"   "\t" "%s\n"
12467                     "Directory:"  "\t" "%s",
12468 
12469     #if   defined (_MSC_VER)
12470                     "MSVC Runtime",
12471     #elif defined (__CYGWIN__)
12472                     "Cygwin Runtime",
12473     #elif defined (_GCC_VER) && defined (_WIN64)
12474                     __mingw_get_crt_info(),
12475     #else
12476                     "MinGW Runtime " TX_QUOTE (__MINGW32_MAJOR_VERSION) "." TX_QUOTE (__MINGW32_MINOR_VERSION),
12477     #endif
12478                     (sizeof (void*) == sizeof (DWORD))? 32 : 64,
12479 
12480                     timeS + 4, timeS + 20, timeS + 11,              // These offsets are ANSI standardized
12481                     txGetModuleFileName(),
12482                     _getcwd (cwd, sizeof (cwd) - 1));
12483 
12484     return text;
12485     }
12486 
12487 //}
12488 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12489 
12491 //}
12492 //=================================================================================================================
12493 
12494 //=================================================================================================================
12495 //{          TXLib API implementation
12496 //           Реализация TXLib API
12497 //=================================================================================================================
12498 
12499 inline const char* txVersion()
12500     {
12501     return _TX_VERSION;
12502     }
12503 
12504 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12505 
12506 inline unsigned txVersionNumber()
12507     {
12508     return _TX_VER;
12509     }
12510 
12511 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12512 
12513 inline HWND txWindow()
12514     {
12515 $0  return _txCanvas_Window;
12516     }
12517 
12518 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12519 
12520 inline HDC& txDC()
12521     {
12522 $0  return _txCanvas_BackBuf[0];
12523     }
12524 
12525 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12526 
12527 inline RGBQUAD* txVideoMemory()
12528     {
12529     return _txCanvas_Pixels;
12530     }
12531 
12532 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12533 
12534 inline int txGetExtentX (HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
12535     {
12536     return txGetExtent (dc) .x;
12537     }
12538 
12539 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12540 
12541 inline int txGetExtentY (HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
12542     {
12543     return txGetExtent (dc) .y;
12544     }
12545 
12546 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12547 
12548 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
12549 
12550 POINT txGetExtent (HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
12551     {
12552 $0  static POINT err = {-1, -1};
12553 
12554     if (!dc) {$ POINT screen = { GetSystemMetrics (SM_CXSCREEN), GetSystemMetrics (SM_CYSCREEN) }; return screen; };
12555 
12556     if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) {$ return err; }
12557 
12558 $   BITMAP bmap = {};
12559 $   txGDI (Win32::GetObject (Win32::GetCurrentObject (dc, OBJ_BITMAP), sizeof (bmap), &bmap), dc) asserted;
12560 
12561 $   POINT  size = { bmap.bmWidth, bmap.bmHeight };
12562 $   return size;
12563     }
12564 
12565 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12566 
12567 bool txDestroyWindow (HWND wnd /*= txWindow()*/)
12568     {
12569 $1  if (!wnd || !txWindow()) return false;
12570 
12571 $   if (wnd != txWindow())
12572         {
12573 $       return !!SendNotifyMessage (txWindow(), _TX_WM_DESTROYWND, 0, (LPARAM) wnd);
12574         }
12575 
12576 $   if (SendNotifyMessage (txWindow(), (_txMain? WM_CLOSE : WM_DESTROY), 0, 0) == 0) return false;
12577 
12578 $   if (_txMain)
12579         {
12580 $       txNotifyIcon (NIIF_WARNING, NULL, "\n" "Очень, очень плохо завершать программу через txDestroyWindow().\n\n"
12581                                                "Возвращайтесь через main(), там вам будут рады.\n");
12582 $       Sleep (_TX_TIMEOUT);
12583         }
12584 
12585 $   _txWaitFor (!_txCanvas_Window, _TX_TIMEOUT);
12586 
12587 $   return _txCanvas_Window == NULL;
12588     }
12589 
12590 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12591 
12592 HPEN txSetColor (COLORREF color, double thickness /*= 1*/, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
12593     {
12594 $1  if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return NULL;
12595 
12596 $   HPEN pen = Win32::CreatePen ((color == TX_TRANSPARENT? PS_NULL : PS_SOLID), ROUND (thickness), color);
12597 
12598 $   if (!pen) return (HPEN) NULL;
12599 
12600 $   if (!_txBuffer_Select (pen, dc))
12601         {
12602 $       Win32::DeleteObject (pen);
12603 $       return (HPEN) NULL;
12604         }
12605 
12606 $   if (txGDI (Win32::SetTextColor (dc, color), dc) == CLR_INVALID)
12607         {$ return (HPEN) NULL; }
12608 
12609 $   return pen;
12610     }
12611 
12612 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12613 
12614 COLORREF txColor (double red, double green, double blue)
12615     {
12616 $1  if (red   > 1) red   = 1; if (red   < 0) red   = 0;
12617 $   if (green > 1) green = 1; if (green < 0) green = 0;
12618 $   if (blue  > 1) blue  = 1; if (blue  < 0) blue  = 0;
12619 
12620 $   COLORREF color = RGB (ROUND (red * 255), ROUND (green * 255), ROUND (blue * 255));
12621 
12622 $   return txSetColor (color)? color : CLR_INVALID;
12623     }
12624 
12625 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12626 
12627 COLORREF txGetColor (HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
12628     {
12629 $1  if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return CLR_INVALID;
12630 
12631 $   HGDIOBJ obj = txGDI ((Win32::GetCurrentObject (dc, OBJ_PEN)), dc);
12632 $   assert (obj); if (!obj) return CLR_INVALID;
12633 
12634 $   union { EXTLOGPEN extLogPen; LOGPEN LogPen; } buf = {};
12635 
12636 $   int size = Win32::GetObject (obj, 0, NULL);
12637 $   Win32::GetObject (obj, sizeof (buf), &buf) asserted;
12638 
12639 $   return (size == sizeof (LOGPEN))? buf.LogPen.lopnColor : buf.extLogPen.elpColor;
12640     }
12641 
12642 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12643 
12644 HBRUSH txSetFillColor (COLORREF color, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
12645     {
12646 $1  if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return NULL;
12647 
12648 $   HBRUSH brush = (color == TX_TRANSPARENT)? (HBRUSH) Win32::GetStockObject (HOLLOW_BRUSH) : Win32::CreateSolidBrush (color);
12649 
12650 $   return (_txBuffer_Select (brush, dc))? brush : (Win32::DeleteObject (brush), (HBRUSH) NULL);
12651     }
12652 
12653 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12654 
12655 COLORREF txFillColor (double red, double green, double blue)
12656     {
12657 $1  if (red   > 1) red   = 1; if (red   < 0) red   = 0;
12658 $   if (green > 1) green = 1; if (green < 0) green = 0;
12659 $   if (blue  > 1) blue  = 1; if (blue  < 0) blue  = 0;
12660 
12661 $   COLORREF color = RGB (ROUND (red * 255), ROUND (green * 255), ROUND (blue * 255));
12662 
12663 $   return txSetFillColor (color)? color : CLR_INVALID;
12664     }
12665 
12666 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12667 
12668 COLORREF txGetFillColor (HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
12669     {
12670 $1  if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return CLR_INVALID;
12671 
12672 $   HGDIOBJ obj = txGDI ((Win32::GetCurrentObject (dc, OBJ_BRUSH)), dc);
12673 $   assert (obj); if (!obj) return CLR_INVALID;
12674 
12675 $   LOGBRUSH buf = {};
12676 $   txGDI ((Win32::GetObject (obj, sizeof (buf), &buf)), dc) asserted;
12677 
12678 $   return buf.lbColor;
12679     }
12680 
12681 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12682 
12683 bool txClear (HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
12684     {
12685 $1  if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return false;
12686 
12687 $   POINT size = txGetExtent (dc);
12688 $   return txGDI (!!(Win32::PatBlt (dc, 0, 0, size.x, size.y, PATCOPY)), dc);
12689     }
12690 
12691 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12692 
12693 bool txSetPixel (double x, double y, COLORREF color, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
12694     {
12695 $1  if (_TX_DEFAULT_HDC_FAILED (dc)) return false;
12696 
12697 $   txGDI ((Win32::SetPixel (dc, ROUND (x), ROUND (y), color)), dc);
12698 
12699 $   return true;
12700     }
12701 
12702 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
12703 
12704 bool txPixel (double x, double y, double red, double green, double blue, HDC dc /*= txDC()*/)
12705     {
12706 $1  if (red   > 1) red   = 1; if (red   < 0) red   = 0;
12707 $   if (green > 1) green = 1; if (green < 0) green = 0;
12708 $   if (blue  > 1) blue  = 1; if (blue  < 0) blue  = 0;
12709 
12710 $   return txSetPixel (x, y, RGB (ROUND (red * 255), ROUND (green * 255), ROUND (blue * 255)), dc);
12711     }
12712
