14597         case 'e': $ stream << std::scientific;                   break;
14598         case 'E': $ stream << std::scientific << std::uppercase; break;
14599 
14600         case 'g': $                                              break;
14601         case 'G': $ stream                    << std::uppercase; break;
14602 
14603         case 'a': $                                              break;
14604         case 'A': $ stream                    << std::uppercase; break;
14605 
14606         case 'c':
14607         case 's':
14608         case 'p': $                                              break;
14609 
14610         default:  $ TX_ERROR ("Invalid format '%.1s' at \"%s\" while printing %s argument %d in \"%s\"", fmt, fmt, txTypename (arg), n, format); break;
14611         }
14612 
14613 $   fmt++;
14614 
14615     if (&arg) {$ stream << arg;      }
14616     else      {$ stream << "(null)"; }
14617 
14618 $   stream.fill  (oldFill);
14619 $   stream.flags (oldFlags);
14620     }
14621 
14622 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14623 
14624 inline void _txPrintV (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, int n, const char*& fmt, int* arg)
14625     {
14626 $1  assert (fmt);
14627 
14628     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (arg)) return;
14629 
14630     if (fmt[0] == '%' && fmt[1] == 'n') {$}
14631     else {$ TX_ERROR ("\"%%n\" required to store print length in int* argument %d in \"%s\"", n, format); }
14632 
14633 $   *arg = (int) stream.str().length();
14634 
14635 $   fmt += 2;
14636     }
14637 
14638 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14639 
14640 template <typename T> inline const T&    _txPrintfNormalizeArg (const T&           arg) { if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&arg)) {;}          return arg;         }
14641                       inline const char* _txPrintfNormalizeArg (const std::string& arg) { if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&arg)) return NULL; return arg.c_str(); }
14642 
14643 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14644 
14645 template <typename... ArgsT>
14646 inline int txPrintf (std::ostringstream& stream, const char* format, ArgsT... args)
14647     {
14648 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return 0;
14649 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&format)) return 0;
14650 
14651 $   const char* fmt = format;
14652 $   _txPrintF (stream, format, 2, fmt, _txPrintfNormalizeArg (args)...);
14653 
14654 $   return (int) stream.str().length();
14655     }
14656 
14657 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14658 
14659 template <typename... ArgsT>
14660 inline int txPrintf (char buffer[], size_t size, const char* format, ArgsT... args)
14661     {
14662 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&buffer)) return 0;
14663 $   if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&format)) return 0;
14664 
14665 $   if (size > 0) size--;
14666 $   buffer[size] = 0;
14667 
14668 $   if (!size) return 0;
14669 
14670 $   std::ostringstream stream;
14671 $   stream.rdbuf() -> pubsetbuf (buffer, size);
14672 
14673 $   txPrintf (stream, format, args...);
14674 
14675 $   return (int) stream.str().length();
14676     }
14677 
14678 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14679 
14680 template <typename... ArgsT>
14681 inline std::string txFormat (const char* format, ArgsT... args)
14682     {
14683 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&format)) return "";
14684 
14685 $   std::ostringstream stream;
14686 
14687 $   txPrintf (stream, format, args...);
14688 
14689 $   return stream.str();
14690     }
14691 
14692 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14693 
14694 template <typename... ArgsT>
14695 inline int txPrintf (const char* format, ArgsT... args)
14696     {
14697 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&format)) return 0;
14698 
14699 $   return printf ("%s", txFormat (format, args...) .c_str());
14700     }
14701 
14702 #endif
14703 
14704 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14705 
14706        int _txPrintfCheck (const char* format, ...) tx_printfy (1);
14707 inline int _txPrintfCheck (const char*,        ...) { return 0; }
14708 
14709 //}
14710 //=================================================================================================================
14711 
14712 //=================================================================================================================
14713 //{          txDialog methods implementation
14714 //           Реализация методов класса txDialog
14715 //
14716 //           See [1] http://msdn.microsoft.com/ru-ru/library/windows/desktop/ms645389%28v=vs.85%29.aspx
14717 //               [2] http://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20050429-00/?p=35743
14718 //               [3] http://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/oldnewthing/20040623-00/?p=38753
14719 //=================================================================================================================
14720 
14721 #ifndef TX_COMPILED
14722 
14723 txDialog::txDialog () :
14724     layout_ (NULL)
14725     {$1}
14726 
14727 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14728 
14729 txDialog::txDialog (const Layout* layout) :
14730     layout_ (layout)
14731     {$1}
14732 
14733 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14734 
14735 const txDialog::Layout* txDialog::setLayout (const Layout* layout)
14736     {
14737 $1  assert (layout);
14738 
14739 $   return ::std::swap (layout_, layout), layout;
14740     }
14741 
14742 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14743 
14744 intptr_t txDialog::dialogBox (WORD resourceID)
14745     {
14746 $1  const char* resName = (char*)(uintptr_t) resourceID;
14747 
14748 $   if (!FindResource (NULL, resName, RT_DIALOG)) return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Не найден ресурс диалога %d", resourceID), 0;
14749 
14750 $   return DialogBoxParam (NULL, resName, NULL, (DLGPROC) DialogProc_, (LPARAM) this);
14751     }
14752 
14753 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14754 
14755 intptr_t txDialog::dialogBox (const txDialog::Layout* layout /*= NULL*/, size_t bufsize /*= 0*/)
14756     {
14757 $1  if (!layout)  layout = layout_;
14758 $   if (!layout)  return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("Не установлен динамический шаблон диалога"), 0;
14759 
14760 $   if (!bufsize) bufsize = 1024;
14761 
14762 $   DLGTEMPLATE* tmpl = (DLGTEMPLATE*) GlobalAlloc (GPTR, bufsize);
14763 $   if (!tmpl) return TX_DEBUG_ERROR ("GlobalAlloc(): Нет памяти для шаблона диалога"), 0;
14764 
14765 $   const Layout* dlg = &layout[0];
14766 $   const Layout  def = { DIALOG, NULL, 0, 0,0,0,0, WS_CAPTION | WS_SYSMENU | DS_MODALFRAME | DS_CENTER, "MS Shell Dlg", 8 };
14767 
14768 $   void* ptr = _tx_DLGTEMPLATE_Create (tmpl, bufsize,
14769                                        (dlg->style? dlg->style : def.style) | DS_SETFONT, 0, 0,
14770                                         dlg->x, dlg->y, dlg->sx, dlg->sy,
14771                                         dlg->caption?  dlg->caption  : def.caption,
14772                                         dlg->font?     dlg->font     : def.font,
14773                                         dlg->fontsize? dlg->fontsize : def.fontsize, NULL);
14774 $   WORD i = 0;
14775 $   for (i = 1; layout[i].wndclass != END; ++i)
14776         {
14777 $       const Layout* item = &layout[i];
14778 
14779 $       ptr = _tx_DLGTEMPLATE_Add (ptr, bufsize - ((char*)ptr - (char*)tmpl),
14780                                    item->style | WS_VISIBLE, 0, item->x, item->y, item->sx, item->sy,
14781                                    item->id, (const char*)(uintptr_t) item->wndclass, item->caption);
14782         }
14783 
14784 $   tmpl->cdit = (unsigned short) (i-1);
14785 
14786 $   intptr_t res = DialogBoxIndirectParam (NULL, tmpl, NULL, (DLGPROC) DialogProc_, (LPARAM) this);
14787 
14788 $   GlobalFree (tmpl);
14789 
14790 $   return res;
14791     }
14792 
14793 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14794 
14795 int txDialog::dialogProc (HWND wnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM)
14796     {
14797 $1  switch (msg)
14798         {
14799         case WM_INITDIALOG: $ SetForegroundWindow (wnd);
14800                             $ break;
14801 
14802         case WM_COMMAND:    $ switch (LOWORD (wParam))
14803             {
14804             case IDOK:
14805             case IDCANCEL:  $ SetForegroundWindow (txWindow()? txWindow() : Win32::GetConsoleWindow());
14806                             $ EndDialog (wnd, (uintptr_t) this);
14807                             $ break;
14808 
14809             default:        $ break;
14810             }
14811                             $ break;
14812         default:            $ break;
14813         }
14814 
14815 $   return FALSE;
14816     }
14817 
14818 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14819 
14820 intptr_t CALLBACK txDialog::DialogProc_ (HWND wnd, UINT msg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam)
14821     {
14822 $1  static txDialog* this__ = NULL;
14823 $   if (msg == WM_INITDIALOG) this__ = (txDialog*) lParam;
14824 $   if (!this__) return FALSE;
14825 
14826 $   return this__-> dialogProc (wnd, msg, wParam, lParam);
14827     }
14828 
14829 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14830 
14831 void* _tx_DLGTEMPLATE_Create (void* globalMem, size_t bufsize, DWORD style, DWORD exStyle,
14832                               WORD controls, short x, short y, short cx, short cy,
14833                               const char caption[], const char font[], WORD fontsize, const char menu[])
14834     {
14835 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (globalMem)) return NULL;
14836 
14837 $   WORD* pw = (WORD*) globalMem;
14838 
14839 $   DLGTEMPLATE* tmpl = ((DLGTEMPLATE*&) pw)++;
14840 
14841 $   tmpl->style = style;
14842 $   tmpl->dwExtendedStyle = exStyle;
14843 $   tmpl->cdit  = controls;
14844 $   tmpl->x     = x;
14845 $   tmpl->y     = y;
14846 $   tmpl->cx    = cx;
14847 $   tmpl->cy    = cy;
14848 
14849 $   if (menu > (const char*) 0xFFFF)
14850         {
14851 $       pw  += MultiByteToWideChar  (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, (menu?    menu    : ""), -1, (wchar_t*) pw,
14852                                     (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) globalMem) : 0xFFFF));
14853         }
14854     else
14855         {
14856 $       *pw++ = (WORD)(uintptr_t) (menu? 0xFFFF : 0);
14857 $       *pw++ = (WORD)(uintptr_t)  menu;
14858         }
14859 
14860 $   if (caption)
14861         {
14862 $       pw  += MultiByteToWideChar  (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, (caption? caption : ""), -1, (wchar_t*) pw,
14863                                     (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) globalMem) : 0xFFFF));
14864         }
14865 
14866 $   if (style & DS_SETFONT)
14867         {
14868 $       *pw++ = fontsize;
14869 $        pw  += MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, (font?    font    : ""), -1, (wchar_t*) pw,
14870                                     (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) globalMem) : 0xFFFF));
14871         }
14872 
14873 $   return pw;
14874     }
14875 
14876 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
14877 
14878 void* _tx_DLGTEMPLATE_Add (void* dlgTemplatePtr, size_t bufsize, DWORD style, DWORD exStyle,
14879                            short x, short y, short cx, short cy,
14880                            WORD id, const char wclass[], const char caption[])
14881     {
14882 $1  if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (dlgTemplatePtr)) return NULL;
14883 
14884 $   WORD* pw = (LPWORD) dlgTemplatePtr;  // Force align at word boundary
14885 $   ((ULONG&) pw)  += 3;
14886 $   ((ULONG&) pw) >>= 2;
14887 $   ((ULONG&) pw) <<= 2;
14888 
14889 $   DLGITEMTEMPLATE* tmpl = ((DLGITEMTEMPLATE*&) pw)++;
14890 
14891 $   tmpl->style = style;
14892 $   tmpl->dwExtendedStyle = exStyle;
14893 $   tmpl->x     = x;
14894 $   tmpl->y     = y;
14895 $   tmpl->cx    = cx;
14896 $   tmpl->cy    = cy;
14897 $   tmpl->id    = id;
14898 
14899 $   if (HIWORD (wclass) == 0xFFFF)
14900         {
14901 $       *pw++ = (WORD) (HIWORD ((uintptr_t) wclass));
14902 $       *pw++ = (WORD) (LOWORD ((uintptr_t) wclass));
14903         }
14904     else if (wclass)
14905         {
14906 $       pw  += MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, const_cast <char*> (wclass), -1, (wchar_t*) pw,
14907                                    (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) dlgTemplatePtr) : 0xFFFF));
14908         }
14909     else
14910         {
14911 $       *pw++ = 0;
14912         }
14913 
14914 $   if (caption)
14915          {
14916 $        pw  += MultiByteToWideChar (_TX_CODEPAGE, 0, caption, -1, (wchar_t*) pw,
14917                                     (int) (bufsize? bufsize - ((char*) pw - (char*) dlgTemplatePtr) : 0xFFFF));
14918          }
14919     else
14920         {
14921 $       *pw++ = 0;
14922         }
14923 
14924 $   *pw++ = 0;
14925 
14926 $   return pw;
14927     }
14928 
14929 #endif // TX_COMPILED
14930 
14931 //}

14937 //=================================================================================================================
14938 
14939 #undef       $
14940 #undef       $0
14941 #undef       $1
14942 #undef       $2
14943 #undef       $3
14944 #undef       $4
14945 #undef       $5
14946 #undef       $6
14947 #undef       $7
14948 #undef       $8
14949 #undef       $9
14950 #undef       $$
14951 
14952 //}

15082 //}----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15083 
15084 #ifndef __TX_DEBUG_MACROS
15085 #define __TX_DEBUG_MACROS  ("Группа отладочных $-макросов")
15086 
15088 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15089 
15090 #define $H            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_BLACK        | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15091 #define $B            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_BLUE         | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15092 #define $G            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_GREEN        | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15093 #define $C            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_CYAN         | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15094 #define $R            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_RED          | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15095 #define $M            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_MAGENTA      | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15096 #define $Y            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_DARKYELLOW   | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15097 #define $d            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTGRAY    | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15098 #define $D            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_DARKGRAY     | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15099 #define $b            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTBLUE    | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15100 #define $g            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTGREEN   | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15101 #define $c            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTCYAN    | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15102 #define $r            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTRED     | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15103 #define $m            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTMAGENTA | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15104 #define $y            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW       | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15105 #define $h            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_WHITE        | BACKGROUND_BLACK);
15106 
15107 #define $i            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTCYAN    | BACKGROUND_BLUE);
15108 #define $I            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW       | BACKGROUND_BLUE);
15109 #define $o            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTGREEN   | BACKGROUND_GREEN);
15110 #define $O            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW       | BACKGROUND_GREEN);
15111 #define $e            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_WHITE        | BACKGROUND_RED);
15112 #define $E            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW       | BACKGROUND_RED);
15113 #define $w            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTMAGENTA | BACKGROUND_MAGENTA);
15114 #define $W            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_YELLOW       | BACKGROUND_MAGENTA);
15115 #define $f            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_BLACK        | BACKGROUND_LIGHTRED);
15116 #define $F            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_MAGENTA      | BACKGROUND_LIGHTRED);
15117 #define $l            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_BLACK        | BACKGROUND_DARKGRAY);
15118 #define $L            txSetConsoleAttr (FOREGROUND_LIGHTGRAY    | BACKGROUND_DARKGRAY);
15119 
15120 #define $T( cond )    txSetConsoleAttr ((cond)? FOREGROUND_LIGHTGREEN : FOREGROUND_LIGHTRED );
15121 
15122 #define $s            _txSaveConsoleAttr TX_JOIN (__txSavedConsoleAttrs, __LINE__);
15123 
15124 #define $sH           $s $H
15125 #define $sB           $s $B
15126 #define $sG           $s $G
15127 #define $sC           $s $C
15128 #define $sR           $s $R
15129 #define $sM           $s $M
15130 #define $sY           $s $Y
15131 #define $sd           $s $d
15132 #define $sD           $s $D
15133 #define $sb           $s $b
15134 #define $sg           $s $g
15135 #define $sc           $s $c
15136 #define $sr           $s $r
15137 #define $sm           $s $m
15138 #define $sy           $s $y
15139 #define $sh           $s $h
15140 
15141 #define $si           $s $i
15142 #define $sI           $s $I
15143 #define $so           $s $o
15144 #define $sO           $s $O
15145 #define $se           $s $e
15146 #define $sE           $s $E
15147 #define $sw           $s $w
15148 #define $sW           $s $W
15149 #define $sf           $s $f
15150 #define $sF           $s $F
15151 #define $sl           $s $l
15152 #define $sL           $s $L
15153 
15154 #define $sT( cond )   $s $T (cond)
15155 
15156 #define $test(cond)   { if (!!(cond)) { $o std::cerr << "[PASSED] " __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #cond; } \
15157                         else          { $e std::cerr << "[FAILED] " __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #cond; } $d; }
15158 
15159 #define $status(cond) $test (cond)
15160 
15161 #define $unittest( code, expected )                                                                                             \
15162     {                                                                                                                           \
15163     const _tx_decltype (code)     & _result   = (code);       /* Should use auto, but g++ 4.7.2 default std is < 2011 */        \
15164     const _tx_decltype (expected) & _expected = (expected);                                                                     \
15165                                                                                                                                 \
15166     if (_result == _expected)                                                                                                   \
15167         { $so std::cerr << "[PASSED] " __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #code; }                                                            \
15168     else                                                                                                                        \
15169         { $se std::cerr << "[FAILED] " __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #code " == (" << _result << "), should be (" << _expected << ")"; } \
15170                                                                                                                                 \
15171     $n;                                                                                                                         \
15172     (_result == _expected);                                                                                                     \
15173     }
15174

15177 #ifdef _GCC_VER
15178 
15179 #define $V(  var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[",             __VA_ARGS__ "]\n") )
15180 #define $V_( var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[",             __VA_ARGS__ "] " ) )
15181 #define $V__(var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[",             __VA_ARGS__ "]"  ) )
15182 
15183 #define $(   var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ",  __VA_ARGS__ "]\n") )
15184 #define $_(  var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ",  __VA_ARGS__ "] " ) )
15185 #define $__( var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ",  __VA_ARGS__ "]"  ) )
15186 
15187 #define $x(  var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ",  __VA_ARGS__ "]\n", ::std::ios_base::showbase | ::std::ios_base::hex) )
15188 #define $x_( var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ",  __VA_ARGS__ "] ",  ::std::ios_base::showbase | ::std::ios_base::hex) )
15189 
15190 #define $v(  var, cond, ...) { { $st (cond); _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ",  __VA_ARGS__ "]" ); } $n; }
15191 #define $v_( var, cond, ...) {   $st (cond); _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ",  __VA_ARGS__ "]" );       }
15192 
15193 #else
15194 
15195 #define $V(  var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[",            #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n") )
15196 #define $V_( var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[",            #__VA_ARGS__ "] " ) )
15197 #define $V__(var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[",            #__VA_ARGS__ "]"  ) )
15198 
15199 #define $(   var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ", #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n") )
15200 #define $_(  var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ", #__VA_ARGS__ "] " ) )
15201 #define $__( var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ", #__VA_ARGS__ "]"  ) )
15202 
15203 #define $x(  var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ", #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n", ::std::ios_base::showbase | ::std::ios_base::hex) )
15204 #define $x_( var, ...)       (               _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ", #__VA_ARGS__ "] ",  ::std::ios_base::showbase | ::std::ios_base::hex) )
15205 
15206 #define $v(  var, cond, ...) { { $st (cond); _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ", #__VA_ARGS__ "]" ); } $n; }
15207 #define $v_( var, cond, ...) {   $st (cond); _txDumpVar ((var),  "[" #var " = ", #__VA_ARGS__ "]" );       }
15208 
15209 #endif
15210 
15211 #define $$                   { txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); { $sC txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f" "[%s (%d) %s]", __FILE__, __LINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__);                                   } txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); }
15212 #define $$_                  { txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); { $sC txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f" "[" "(%d) %s]",           __LINE__, __func__);                                          } txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); }
15213 #define $meow(...)           { txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); { $sc txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f" "[%s (%d) %s]", __FILE__, __LINE__, __func__); txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f " __VA_ARGS__); } txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); }
15214 #define $meow_               { txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); { $sc txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f" "[%s (%d) %s]", __FILE__, __LINE__, __func__); txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f");              } txOutputDebugPrintf ("\f\n"); }
15215 
15216 #define $$$(   ... )         ( ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n", _txDumpVar ((__VA_ARGS__),"\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ ": ", ", DONE]\n\n") )
15217 #define $$$_(  ... )         ( ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n", _txDumpVar ((__VA_ARGS__),  "[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ ": ", ", DONE]\n\n") )
15218 
15219 #define $$$$(  ... )         { ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n"; _txDumpVarSuffix         ("\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__        " DONE]\n\n"); { __VA_ARGS__; } }
15220 #define $$$$_( ... )         { ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n"; _txDumpVarSuffix         (  "[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__        " DONE]\n\n"); { __VA_ARGS__; } }
15221 #define $do(   ... )           ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]\n";                                                                                           __VA_ARGS__
15222 #define $DO(   ... )           ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]...\n"; $p;                                                                                    __VA_ARGS__
15223 #define $Do(   ... )           ::std::cerr << "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]...\n";                                                                                        \
15224                                txMessageBox ( "\n[" __TX_FILELINE__ ": " #__VA_ARGS__ "]...\n", __TX_FUNCTION__);                                                                      __VA_ARGS__
15225 
15226 #define $n                   { ::std::cerr << "\n";   }
15227 #define $nn                  { ::std::cerr << "\n\n"; }
15228 #define $t                   { ::std::cerr << "\t";   }
15229 
15230 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15231 
15232 // This will never be documented, he-he. Read the source, Luke.
15233 
15234 #if defined (_DEBUG)
15235     #define $debug       if (1)
15236     #define $printf      if (1)
15237     #define $PRINTF      if (1)
15238 #else
15239     #define $debug       if (0)
15240     #define $printf      if (0)
15241     #define $PRINTF      if (0)
15242 #endif
15243 
15244 #define $$d              $debug
15245 #define $$w              $$$$
15246 #define $$s              __TX_FILELINE__
15247 #define $$b              DebugBreak()
15248 #define $$p              { if (txMessageBox (__TX_FILELINE__ "\n\n" "[Повтор] - продолжение программы,\n" "[Отмена] - остановка", \
15249                                                               __TX_FUNCTION__, MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_RETRYCANCEL) == IDCANCEL) ::exit (2); }
15250 #define $$P              (     txMessageBox (__TX_FILELINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__, MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_YESNOCANCEL) )
15251 #define $ppp             { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%s ""%s: ""Нажмите любую клавишу для продолжения]", __TX_FILELINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__); } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15252 #define $pp              { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%04d %s: ""Нажмите любую клавишу для продолжения]", __LINE__,        __TX_FUNCTION__); } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15253 #define $p               { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%s ""%s(): Нажмите любую клавишу для продолжения]", __TX_FILELINE__, __func__);        } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15254 #define $ppp_            { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%s ""%s]",                                          __TX_FILELINE__, __TX_FUNCTION__); } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15255 #define $pp_             { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%04d %s]",                                          __LINE__,        __TX_FUNCTION__); } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15256 #define $p_              { { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "[%s ""%s()]",                                        __TX_FILELINE__, __func__);        } $P; { $sy; fprintf (stderr, "...\n"); } }
15257 #define $P               ( ((int(*)()) (_getch)) () )  // Avoid "return value not used"
15258 
15259 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15260 
15261 struct _txSaveConsoleAttr
15262     {
15263     unsigned attr_;
15264 
15265              _txSaveConsoleAttr()           : attr_ (txGetConsoleAttr ()) {}
15266     explicit _txSaveConsoleAttr (WORD attr) : attr_ (txGetConsoleAttr ()) { txSetConsoleAttr (attr);  }
15267             ~_txSaveConsoleAttr()                                         { txSetConsoleAttr (attr_); }
15268     };
15269 
15270 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15271 
15272 struct _txDumpVarSuffix
15273     {
15274     typedef _txDumpVarSuffix this_t;
15275 
15276     const char* suffix_;
15277 
15278     explicit _txDumpVarSuffix (const char suffix[] = "") : suffix_ (suffix) { assert (suffix); }
15279             ~_txDumpVarSuffix()                          { ::std::cerr << suffix_; }
15280 
15281             _txDumpVarSuffix (const this_t&) _tx_delete;
15282     this_t& operator =       (const this_t&) _tx_delete;
15283     };
15284 
15285 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15286 
15287 #define ARGS__  const char* prefix, const char* suffix, std::ios_base::fmtflags flags,                             int deep
15288 #define ARGS_   const char* prefix, const char* suffix, std::ios_base::fmtflags flags = std::ios_base::fmtflags(), int deep = 0
15289 #define VALS_   prefix, suffix, flags, deep
15290 
15291 template <typename T, typename StreamT> const T&    _txDumpVal (const T&  value, StreamT& stream, ARGS_);
15292 
15293 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15294 
15295 template <typename T> inline const T&               _txDumpVar (const T&            value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std:: cerr, VALS_); return value; }
15296 template <typename T> inline       T&               _txDumpVar (      T&            value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std:: cerr, VALS_); return value; }
15297 
15298 template <int N>      inline const char           (&_txDumpVar (const char        (&value) [N],     ARGS_)) [N] { _txDumpVal (value, std:: cerr, VALS_); return value; }
15299 template <int N>      inline       char           (&_txDumpVar (      char        (&value) [N],     ARGS_)) [N] { _txDumpVal (value, std:: cerr, VALS_); return value; }
15300 
15301 template <int N>      inline const wchar_t        (&_txDumpVar (const wchar_t     (&value) [N],     ARGS_)) [N] { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15302 template <int N>      inline       wchar_t        (&_txDumpVar (      wchar_t     (&value) [N],     ARGS_)) [N] { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15303 
15304                       inline const wchar_t&         _txDumpVar (const wchar_t&      value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15305                       inline       wchar_t&         _txDumpVar (      wchar_t&      value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15306 
15307                       inline const wchar_t*&        _txDumpVar (const wchar_t*&     value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15308                       inline       wchar_t*&        _txDumpVar (      wchar_t*&     value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15309 
15310                       inline const std::wstring&    _txDumpVar (const std::wstring& value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15311                       inline       std::wstring&    _txDumpVar (      std::wstring& value,          ARGS_)      { _txDumpVal (value, std::wcerr, VALS_); return value; }
15312 
15313 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15314 
15315 template <typename T, typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const T&            value, StreamT& stream)     {                     stream <<         value;                                    }
15316 template             <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const char          value, StreamT& stream)     {                     stream <<  "'" << value <<  "'";                            }
15317 template             <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const wchar_t       value, StreamT& stream)     {                     stream << L"'" << value << L"'";                            }
15318 template             <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const char*         value, StreamT& stream)     { if (value)          stream <<  '"' << value <<  '"'; else stream <<  "(null)";  }
15319 template             <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const wchar_t*      value, StreamT& stream)     { if (value)          stream << L'"' << value << L'"'; else stream << L"(null)";  }
15320 template             <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const std::string&  value, StreamT& stream)     { if (value.length()) stream <<  '"' << value <<  '"'; else stream <<  "(empty)"; }
15321 template             <typename StreamT> inline void _txDumpVal (const std::wstring& value, StreamT& stream)     { if (value.length()) stream << L'"' << value << L'"'; else stream << L"(empty)"; }
15322 
15323 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15324 
15325 template <typename T, typename StreamT>
15326 inline const T& _txDumpVal (const T& value, StreamT& stream, ARGS__)
15327     {
15328     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&value))  return value;
15329     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return value;
15330     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED ( prefix)) return value;
15331     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED ( suffix)) return value;
15332 
15333     $sc;
15334     if (!deep) stream << prefix;
15335 
15336     std::ios_base::fmtflags old = stream.flags ((flags)? flags : stream.flags());
15337 
15338     if (!_txIsBadReadPtr (&value))
15339         {
15340         _txDumpVal (value, stream);
15341         }
15342     else
15343         {
15344         $sE; stream << "<НЕВЕРНЫЙ АДРЕС " << &value << ">";
15345         }
15346 
15347     stream.flags (old);
15348 
15349     if (!deep) stream << ((*suffix == ']')? "" : ": ") << suffix;
15350 
15351     return value;
15352     }
15353 
15354 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15355 
15356 template <typename T, int N>
15357 inline T (&_txDumpVar (T (&value) [N], ARGS_)) [N]
15358     {
15359     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&value))  return value;
15360     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED ( prefix)) return value;
15361     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED ( suffix)) return value;
15362 
15363     std::ostream& stream = std::cerr;
15364 
15365     $sc; if (!deep) std::cerr << prefix;
15366     $C;  std::cerr << ((deep)? " {" : "{");
15367 
15368     if (!_txIsBadReadPtr (value))
15369         {
15370         for (int i = 0; ; i++)
15371             {
15372             { $sC; stream << "[" << i << "]="; }
15373 
15374             _txDumpVar (value[i], prefix, suffix, flags, deep+1);
15375 
15376             if (i >= N-1) break;
15377 
15378             stream << ", ";
15379             }
15380         }
15381     else
15382         {
15383         $sE; stream << "<НЕВЕРНЫЙ АДРЕС " << &value << ">";
15384         }
15385 
15386     $C; std::cerr << "}";
15387     $c; if (!deep) std::cerr << ((*suffix == ']')? "" : ": ") << suffix;
15388 
15389     return value;
15390     }
15391 
15392 #undef ARGS__
15393 #undef ARGS_
15394 #undef VALS_
15395 
15396 //=================================================================================================================
15397 
15398 inline std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const POINT& point)
15399     {
15400     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return stream;
15401     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&point))  return stream;
15402 
15403     if (&point) stream << "{ x: " << point.x << ", y: " << point.y << " }";
15404     else        stream << "(null)";
15405 
15406     return stream;
15407     }
15408 
15409 inline std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const SIZE& size)
15410     {
15411     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return stream;
15412     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&size))   return stream;
15413 
15414     if (&size) stream << "{ cx: " << size.cx << ", cy: " << size.cy << " }";
15415     else       stream << "(null)";
15416 
15417     return stream;
15418     }
15419 
15420 inline std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const RECT& rect)
15421     {
15422     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&stream)) return stream;
15423     if (_TX_ARGUMENT_FAILED (&rect))   return stream;
15424 
15425     if (&rect) stream << "{ left: "  << rect.left  << ", top: "    << rect.top    <<
15426                          ", right: " << rect.right << ", bottom: " << rect.bottom << " }";
15427 
15428     else       stream << "(null)";
15429 
15430     return stream;
15431     }
15432 
15433 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15435 
15436 #endif
15437 
15438 //}
15439 //=================================================================================================================

15570 
15573 using namespace TX;                    // Allow easy usage of TXLib functions
15574 
15575 using ::std::cin;                      // Predefined usings to avoid "using namespace std"
15576 using ::std::cout;
15577 using ::std::cerr;
15578 using ::std::string;
15579 using ::std::wcin;
15580 using ::std::wcout;
15581 using ::std::wcerr;
15582 using ::std::wstring;

15587 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15588 //{          Compiler- and platform-specific
15589 //           Адаптация к компиляторам и платформам
15590 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15592 
15593 #if defined (_GCC_VER)
15594 
15595     #pragma GCC optimize               "strict-aliasing"
15596 
15597     #pragma GCC pop_options
15598     #pragma GCC diagnostic pop
15599 
15600     #endif
15601 
15602 #if defined (_CLANG_VER)
15603 
15604     #pragma clang diagnostic pop
15605 
15606     #endif
15607 
15608 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
15609 
15610 #if defined (_MSC_VER)
15611 
15612     #pragma warning (pop)              // Restoring maximum level
15613 
15614     #endif
15615 
15616 #if defined (__INTEL_COMPILER)
15617 
15618     #pragma warning (default:  174)    // Remark: expression has no effect
15619     #pragma warning (default:  304)    // Remark: access control not specified ("public" by default)
15620     #pragma warning (default:  444)    // Remark: destructor for base class "..." is not virtual
15621     #pragma warning (default:  522)    // Remark: function redeclared "inline" after being called
15622     #pragma warning (default: 1684)    // Conversion from pointer to same-sized integral type (potential portability problem)
15623 
15624     #pragma warning (disable:  981)    // Remark: operands are evaluated in unspecified order
15625 
15626     #endif
15627 
15629 //}
